He is currently apply for this Kiva loan, which is his first financing through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With the loan, he will purchase merchandise for the year-end season which is approaching, and he lacks the stock and capital to supply his growing customer base.

loans.use: to buy tables, doors, and other wooden items.

loans.name: Boir

texts.ru: Боир женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 25 лет Боир занимается  реализацией мёда. Он получает хороший мед.  Кроме того он занимается откормом скота и выращиванием арбуза, дины и другие сельхозкультуры. Жена занимается домохозяйством, а друг помогает ему в бизнесе. Имеет дополнительный доход, который получает от сыновей, которые уехали в Россию на заработки. Боир хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплатить за аренду земли.
texts.en: Boir is married and is raising three children.  He has been involved in selling honey for over 25 years.  He obtains good honey.  Besides this, Boir is involved in fattening up livestock and growing watermelon, honeydew and other agricultural crops.  His wife is involved in household work, and his friend helps him with the business.  Boir has an additional income, which he receives from his sons, who left to work in Russia.  Boir wants to obtain a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers and pay for land lease.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and pay for land lease

loans.name: Rabih

texts.en:
Rabih is a 36-year-old, married Lebanese man who lives with his wife and their one child. Their child attends school. He combines forces with his wife in order to pay their child’s education fees.

In 2010, he opened a small café, where people can have a soft drink and enjoy a hubble-bubble. He has quickly built up the business and is looking forward to further expanding his business.

Now, he is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,300 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional products such as soft drinks, charcoal and other items. He notes that this will help him attract more customers. In the future, he plans to open his own restaurant.

loans.use: to attract more customers by purchasing additional products such as soft drinks and charcoal

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 49-year-old Lebanese married woman who lives with her husband. They’re both working really hard to cover the heavy costs of life. For that reason, she decided to open her own home products shop in 1993. She is looking forward to further develop her shop. She sells high tech products at fair prices, which makes her customers loyal to her. Today, she’s asking to borrow $2200 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy additional home supplies for her shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic supplies and many other items. She’s sure that buying these new supplies will help her earn superior income. In the future, she plans to work as a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy additional items for her shop such as refrigerators, televisions, plastic supplies and many other items

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Иброхим более 10 лет занимается купле- продажей веников. Он женат и имеет двух детей. Он сам занимается этим бизнесом и усердно работает. Приобретает товар в Узбекистане. Иброхим хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Иброхим хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000 Сомони для увлечения оборотного капитала с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ibrohim has been involved in buying and selling brooms.  He is married and has two children.  He himself is involved in this business and works diligently.  He buys his merchandise from Uzbekistan.  Ibrohim wants to improve his living conditions and increase his working capital.  Ibrohim wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3000 Somoni to increase his working capital in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to expand his business

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 38-year-old, married Lebanese man living with his wife and two children. Their children currently attend school.

He is the main income provider in his family, and he is always looking for new ways to meet his family's needs. Since 1987, he has been working as a car repairman.

Currently, he is seeking to borrow $2,900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to improve his old equipment and to buy new supplies and painting tools. He expects that this loan will improve his business and, as a result, his family's standard of living. In the future, he plans to request more Kiva loans in order to enlarge his garage and to thereby serve more clients.

loans.use: to improve his old equipment and to buy new supplies and tools

loans.name: Abduvosit

texts.ru: Абдувосит активный и целеустремленный молодой парень. Более трех лет он занимается предоставлением транспортных услуг. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход и от полученной прибыли построил  для себя дом. А теперь хотел бы получить займ для завершения ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Abduvosit is an active and goal-oriented young man.  He has been involved in providing transportation services for over three years.  He earns a good income from this business and built himself a house from received profits.  And now Abduvosit wants to obtain a loan to complete repairs for his house.  He relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 37-year-old, married Lebanese man living with his wife and their two school-age children.

He is the one that takes care of the family and covers their living expenses. Ali started his own business in 1997 as a car mechanic in his garage. He has a solid number of customers that seek his services on a regular basis.

Currently, he is asking for a loan in the amount of $2,900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new mechanical tools for his business as well as an electrical generator in order to be able to respond quickly to his clients’ problems. He believes that providing prompt and quality service is essential to both maintain and attract new customers. In the future, he plans to open his own car show room.

loans.use: to meet customers' needs by purchasing new tools and a generator for his business

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 44-year-old Lebanese married man, living with his wife and two children, who both attend school.  He strives to work hard to be able to satisfy his family's needs. He has been working as an independent taxi driver since 1996, and is really lucky to have such a good job. 

Today, he is in need of a loan of $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform necessary maintenance on his car's engine and pay its fees. This will certainly improve his business and help him attract more customers. In the future, he plans to buy a minivan and target a wider range of customers.

loans.use: to perform necessary maintenance on his car's engine and pay its fees.

loans.name: Lavinia Dora

texts.es: La señora Lavinia  se dedica desde hace diez años al comercio de artefactos eléctricos,  que trae desde la ciudad de Oruro, tiene una lista de clientes que son los que hacen los pedidos, ella entrega al contado,  crédito que entrega y después va a cobrar ya sea quincenal o mensual, vive en domicilio familiar con su hermano y sus padres en el km 3,5 de la zona de la Blanco Galindo,  necesita el crédito para aumentar el capital que fue haciendo a través de los años comprando mercadería en artefactos eléctricos  y en variedad de productos es soltera  y todos sus ingresos los destina en reinvertir y también  ayuda con algunos gastos en su hogar, es una persona muy responsable amable y trabajadora que se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Lavinia has maintained a business selling electric appliances for the last 10 years, buying these items in the city Oruro.  She has a list of client orders, and she brings the products back for them, paying up front. Her clients pay in bi-weekly or monthly installments.  She lives at home with her brother and parents at km 3.5 in the area of Blanco Galindo.  She needs this loan to increase her capital accumulated over years buying  electric appliances and varied products.  She is single and will re-invest her profits as well as help with household expenses. She is a friendly and hard-working person, and is pleased with the opportunity offered to her.

loans.use: have a base of capital to buy electric appliances

loans.name: Nayandra

texts.es: La Sra. Nayandra  vive en la zona del plan 3000 en casa familiar. Ella tiene cuatro hijos que se encuentra en edad escolar, la Sra. Nayandra es promotora de venta de cosméticos,  ropa por catalogo y  zapatos,  también trabaja medio tiempo en una panadería  es cliente que le toca su quinta secuencia en la institución es una cliente antigua, comenzó en bancas de emprendimiento, luego en grupos solidarios y este es su primer crédito individual,  ella  ha demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago,  el crédito que esta solicitando es para aumentar su capital de trabajo, compra de cosméticos y ropa que se encuentra de promoción, ya que por las fiestas de fin de año tiene mucha demanda,  la Sra. Nayandra es una persona trabajadora, con ganas de superación para darles un futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Nayandra lives in the plan 3000 zone in a family home. She has four children who are school age. Nayandra is a promoter of cosmetic sales, catalog clothing, and shoes. She also works part time in a bakery. She is a member who will be in her fifth sequence with the institution. She is an old member, she began with the communal banks, and then went to solidarity groups, and now this is her first individual loan. She has demonstrated good payment responsibility. The loan she is requesting is to increase her working capital and buy cosmetics and clothing that is on sale; because of all the end of year parties, she has a lot of demand. She is a hard working person, with the desire to better herself to give her children a future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael es una persona que siempre ha querido mantener a sus padres con la mejor calidad de vida posible, pues desde hace algún tiempo sus padres están bajo su responsabilidad debido a que se encuentran en una edad que les es difícil trabajar. Rafael genera los ingresos necesarios para su hogar con la actividad de la agricultura, actividad que desarrolla desde hace varios años pero que no le permite tener grandes ingresos, pues la competencia en su región es muy fuerte; por esto, Rafael alterna esta actividad con la de las tiendas generales. La tienda que tiene Rafael no es muy grande y le genera unos pocos ingresos a los que le suma los ingresos generados por la agricultura y así puede sostener los gastos suyos y los de sus padres. Con el ánimo de generar mayores ingresos para sostener sus padres, Rafael quiere surtir una tienda que arrendó hace algunos días, por esto está en busca de un préstamo que le permita comprar el surtido como legumbres, aceite, granos, detergente, gaseosas y licor. Rafael aspira que con esta nueva tienda se aumenten sus ingresos considerablemente y pueda cumplir su sueño de tener sus padres en una condición mucho mejor a la actual, y también mejorar su calidad de vida permitiéndose disfrutar un poco de lo fuerte que ha trabajado durante toda su vida.
texts.en: Rafael is a person who has always wanted to support his parents with the best quality of life possible, for awhile now his parents have been his responsibility since they are at an age when its difficult for them to work. He makes the necessary income for his household through agriculture, an activity that he has been involved with for several years now but that does not allow him to make a large income. The competition in his region is very strong; this is why, he alternates this activity with a general store. The store that he has is not very large, it gives him little income that he adds to the income from agriculture, and in this manner, he can support his expenses and those of his parents. In an effort to support his parents, he wants to stock a store that he leased a few days ago. This is why he is searching for a loan that will allow him to buy merchandise such as vegetables, oils, grains, detergent, soft drinks, and liquor. He hopes that with this new store he will be able to increase his income considerably and be able to fulfill his dream of having his parents in a much better condition and improve his quality of life allowing him to enjoy a little from the hard work he has done all his life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as vegetables, oils, detergents, grains and liquor.

loans.name: Sorangel

texts.es: Dedicación y amor por su familia son la mejor manera de reconocer a Sorangel, una mujer que a sus 52 años siempre ha buscado la manera de que sus 4 hijos y su esposo tengan la mejor calidad de vida posible. Desde su último embarazo, hace cerca de 20 años, Sorangel inició con la actividad de la venta de productos en su tienda general, y gracias a esta ha podido sufragar los gastos de su hogar. Gracias a que su negocio ha tenido una muy buena acogida, su surtido se ha venido rebajando considerablemente por lo que Sorangel requiere de la compra de más surtido para su negocio. Sin embargo, Sorangel no dispone del capital necesario, por lo que aspira a que con un préstamo pueda acceder a surtir su negocio con la mercancía que sus clientes siempre le piden. Sorangel aspira que con su tienda bien surtida se incrementen sus ventas y por ende sus ingresos, y poder así cumplir su sueño de brindarles a sus hijos una buena estabilidad económica en un futuro y que puedan acceder a la mejor educación posible.
texts.en: Dedication and love for her family are the best ways to describe Sorangel, a woman who at age 52 has always looked for a way to help her 4 children and husband to get the best quality of life possible. Since her last pregnancy almost 20 years ago, Sorangel launched her general store, and thanks to this business, she has been able to cover the household expenses. Because her business has been successful, her products have been running considerably low, which is why Sorangel needs to purchase more products. However, she does not have the necessary capital, which is why she hopes that with this loan, she will be able to restock her shop with the merchandise that her customers always ask for. Sorangel hopes that with a well-stocked shop, sales will increase and in so doing, so will her profits. Thus, she will be able to obtain her dream of providing her children with financial stability in the future, and that they will be able to gain access to the best education possible.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her shop and meet customer demand.

loans.name: Pedro Hernan

texts.es:
Don Pedro tiene 55 años de edad,  vive en unión libre y es padre de 4 hijos.
Pedro se dedica al comercio, tiene 3 años de tener su negocio, su actividad principal es la compra y venta de chatarra y todo material reciclable.
el Sr. Pedro utilizara el credito para comprar  cobre y material reciclable para revender y así obtener mas ganancias para el sustento de su hogar. 
todo lo que compra lo transporta en su vehiculo., nos comento que se siente muy feliz ya que todo le esta saliendo bien y que sus ingresos estan mejorando.
texts.en:
Father of four, Pedro, is 55 years old and is in a free union relationship.
Pedro has been running his own business for the last 3 years, in which he primarily buys and sells scrap metal and other recyclable materials. He plans to use this loan to buy copper and recyclable materials to re-sell in order to increase his earnings, which he will use to provide for his family. He transports everything he buys in his truck. He told us that he is very happy as everything is turning out well and his income is improving.

loans.use: to buy scrap metal.

loans.name: Farrukh

texts.ru: Фаррух 29-летний парень рабочего класса, женат и имеет 1-го ребенка. Занимается услугами по ремонту автомашин и арендует цех,где работает с одним партнером.Его цех находится в центре города у главной дороги,где много клиентов и ежедневно он обслуживает в среднем по 18-20 автомашин.Работает в нашей организации более двух лет и использовал кредит на потребительские цели,на коммерческие цели и т.д. Живет Фаррух с родителями и он постоянносоветуется с отцом,так как молодой и имеет небольшой опыт.Жена Фарруха- Холнисо помогает семье,занимаясь пошивом национальных платьев и вносит свой небольшой вклад в семейный бюджет.Сейчас Фаррух хочет расширить свой цех и покупает новую технику для вулканизации и запрашивает новый кредит
texts.en: Farrukh is a 29 year-old young man of the working class, married and has one child.  He is involved in providing auto repair services and leases a work space, where he works with one partner.  His work space is located by the main road in the city center, where there are many clients, and Farrukh servers on average 18-20 cars per day.  He has been working with our organization for over two years and used loans for consumer needs, commercial goals, etc.  Farrukh lives with his parents and constantly seeks advice from his father because Farrukh is young and does not have a lot of experience.  His wife, Holniso, helps the family by sewing national dresses and provides her small input to the family budget.  Currently, Farrukh wants to expand his work space and is buying new equipment for tire vulcanization, and is requesting a new loan.

loans.use: to purchase new equipment

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Emprendedor y dedicado a su familia son las dos mejores palabras para identificar a Luis Enrique, que con sus 52 años tiene un negocio de confección el cual le genera los ingresos necesarios para el sustento de sus 6 hijos y su esposa. Hace 23 años Luis Enrique decidió emprender su propio negocio de confección, y actualmente su negocio sigue creciendo y ofreciendo productos de muy buena calidad. El sueño de Luis Enrique siempre fue tener un negocio que le pueda generar ingresos necesarios con los cuales pueda atender las necesidades de su familia, y con el que pueda brindar empleo a las personas que más lo necesitan. Gracias a este negocio, Luis Enrique ha podido brindarles a sus 6 hijos todo lo que han necesitado y no han tenido que pasar por circunstancias adversas como si lo tuvo que hacer el en su tiempo. Luis Enrique tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, pero a veces no puede abastecerlos todos por falta de materia prima para su producto; actualmente presenta la misma situación y requiere de la compra de la materia prima para abastecer los pedidos de sus clientes, sin embargo, en el momento no dispone del capital necesario, por lo que aspira a que un crédito le permita acceder a la compra de esta materia prima y pueda seguir cumpliendo con todos los pedidos de sus clientes. Luis Enrique sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo y que su familia pueda encontrar en el una buena oportunidad de empleo y generación de ingresos.
texts.en:
Enterprising and dedicated to his family are the two best ways to describe Luis Enrique who at the age of 52 has a sewing business that generates the income necessary to support his six children and his wife.  Luis Enrique decided to start his own sewing business 23 years ago and his business continues growing to this day offering very good quality products.

Luis Enrique’s dream is to always have a business that will generate the income necessary to tend to all his family’s needs and that he can use to offer employment to those who need it most.  Thanks to this business, Luis Enrique has been able to provide his six children with everything they’ve needed and they have not had to go through any adverse circumstances like he had to at some point in the past.  

Luis Enrique has good pending orders from customers but sometimes he’s unable to fill them for lack of raw materials for his products.  He’s currently in that same situation and needs to buy raw materials to fill all his customer orders.  However, at present he lacks the necessary capital to do so which is why he’s hoping for a loan that will allow him to access raw materials to continue filling customer orders.  Luis Enrique dreams with his business continuing to grow and that his family can find good opportunities for employment and income generation.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Wissam

texts.en:
Wissam is a 29-year-old single man. He has worked in car maintenance for ten years and opened his shop in 2007. His business is going fine.

Wissam is a hard worker and he is well-known in the region. His business still needs to be updated with new, improved machines and equipment.

This is Wissam's second cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower, with a good standing history of paying back.

He is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua  in order to buy new necessary machines for his business, in addition to a highly-requested power generator necessary for his business.

He hopes to expand his business in the future and open a big car maintenance company.

loans.use: to buy necessary equipment for his business.

loans.name: Gabriel De Jesus

texts.es: Gabriel siempre ha querido tener un trabajo en el que pueda tener una estabilidad económica y pueda ofrecerle una buena calidad de vida a su esposa y sus 4 hijos. Es por esto que inició con el negocio de su tienda general desde hace algún tiempo, pues estaba dedicado a la actividad de la construcción y no tenía grandes oportunidades de empleo. Con su tienda como la fuente de sus ingresos, Gabriel ha visto como esta actividad le puede generar una mayor estabilidad económica y mayores oportunidades de progreso para el y su familia. Gracias a que su negocio tiene una muy buena reputación en su sector, las ventas le han reducido su inventario notablemente por lo que Gabriel requiere de la compra de más mercancía que le permita abastecer los requerimientos de sus clientes y poder así seguir incrementando sus ventas y mejorando las condiciones de vida de toda su familia. Sin embargo, Gabriel no dispone del capital necesario para la compra de su mercancía, por lo que aspira a que con un préstamo pueda acceder a esta mercancía y su negocio siga incrementando sus ventas constantemente. Gabriel sueña con que su negocio siga creciendo y en un futuro poder contratar a personas que requieran de unos ingresos económicos, para que además de mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia, le mejore la calidad de vida de muchos habitantes de su sector.
texts.en: Gabriel has always wanted to have a job that would give him financial stability, one that would allow him to offer a better quality of life to his wife and 4 children. This is the reason why he launched his general store some time ago. He used to work in construction, but he did not have many employment opportunities. With his store as his source of income, Gabriel has seen how the business has been able to create greater financial stability for him, and better opportunities to progress for him and his family. Because his business has a very good reputation in the area, sales have greatly reduced his inventory, which is why Gabriel needs to purchase more products that will help him meet customer demand, thus allowing him to keep boosting sales and improving his entire family's living conditions. Nevertheless, Gabriel does not have the capital necessary to purchase more merchandise, which is why he hopes to obtain a loan that will help him acquire those products and constantly boost sales. Gabriel hopes that his business will keep growing and that he will be able to hire people who need money in the future, thus, he will not only improve his family's quality of life, but also that of other local residents.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise and meet customer demand.

loans.name: Manuel David

texts.es:
EL Joven Manuel tiene 21 años de edad, vive en unión libre y se dedica al comercio, tiene ocho meses de haber iniciado su negocio, Manuel tiene una pequeña pulperia en su casa de habitacion, tambien alquila por hora un video juego,  único en la zona donde él recide, su negocio opera en su casa de habitación.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos, lacteos y carnes, desea tener surtido su negocio, nos comento que las ventas estan mejorando y que desea estar preparado para las exigencias de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Young Manuel is 21 years old, and he is in a common-law marriage.  It's been 8 months since he started his retail business.   Manuel has a small grocery store in his house.  He also rents video games by the hour, and his is the only such business in the neighborhood where he lives.  He operates the business from the house that he lives in.

Manuel will use this loan to buy groceries, staple grains, dairy products and meat.  He wants to have more products in his store.  He tells us that his sales are improving, and he wants to be prepared to meet the needs of his customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries, staple grains, dairy products and meat

loans.name: Marta Yolanda

texts.es:
Doña Marta tiene 44 años de edad, vive en unión libre, es madre de 3 hijos y se dedica al comercio , tiene mas de 4 años de tener su negocio el cual es una pulperia y molino para moler maiz. su negocio opera en su casa de habitación.
la Sra. Marta nos está solicitando el crédito para comprar abarroteria, lacteos, granos basicos y carnes. desea tener surtiido su negocio y ofrecer mas variedad a sus clientes.
nos comento que se siente feliz ya que todo le esta saliendo bien, tiene la certeza que este año sera muy bueno para ella.
texts.en:
Marta is 44 years old and lives with her common-law husband.  She is the mother of three children and works in commerce.  She has owned her business for four years - she has a grocery store and a corn mill.  She runs her business from her home.

Marta is requesting a loan to buy groceries, dairy products, basic grains and meat.  She would like to stock her business and offer her customers more variety.  She tells us that she is happy as everything is going well.  She is certain that this year will be a good one for her.

loans.use: to buy groceries, dairy products, basic grains and meat

loans.name: Fredy Miguel

texts.es:
Fredy Miguel es todo un luchador, tiene 53 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Ica, Perú, es muy carismáticos, y sobre todo siempre regala una sonrisa, en sus tiempos libres disfruta de leer libros ya que nos comenta que le ayuda despejarse cuando se encuentra de mal humor, le gusta mucho un platillo típico de nuestro país llamado “Tallarines con Causa Rellena, Fredy estudio administración de empresas, es casado  y tiene un hijo de 16 años que cursa el quinto grado de secundaria, su esposa se dedica a sus labores como ama de casa pero es su  brazo derecho ya que siempre lo apoya en todo lo que él hace.

Fredy trabaja en su bodega en la venta de abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas, el  realiza esta labor alrededor de 10 horas diarias, con mucho esfuerzo, el trabaja también como administrador en un colegio y es que hay que trabajar mucho sino como se puede vivir y sobre todo llevar un pan a la casa nos comenta Fredy. El cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a la buena atención y la calidad de los productos que ofrece.

Fredy está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar más mercadería para su negocio ya que va tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer, ello mejorara su ingresos con lo que le permitirá ahorrar para cumplir su más adorado sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Fredy Miguel is a very tenacious man.  He is 53 years old and lives in the city of Ica, Peru.  He is very charismatic and, above all, he always greets people with a smile.  In his free time, he enjoys reading books.  He tells us that it helps him to clear his head when he is in a bad mood.  He very much enjoys eating a traditional Peruvian dish called "tallarines con causa rellena".  Fredy studied business management.  He is married and has a 16-year-old son who is in the fifth year of his secondary education.  Fredy's wife works as a homemaker but she is his right-hand woman as she always supports him in everything he does.

Fredy works in his store, selling groceries and soda.  He works in this business for around 10 hours a day.  He puts in a lot of effort.  He also works as a school administrator and he has to work hard because "if not, how can you live and, above all, how can you provide for your family?' Fredy asks.  He believes that his business is doing well thanks to the good service he offers and the quality of the products he sells.

Fredy is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their support, he will be able to buy more merchandise for his business and have a greater variety of products to sell.  He will improve his income which will allow him to save up and fulfill his biggest dream: to own his own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries and drinks)

loans.name: Tavarali

texts.ru: Таварали житель города Куляб. Ему 43 года. У него трое детей. Он таксист. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для ремонта автомашины марки Тико.
texts.en: Tavarali is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 43 years old and has three children.  He is a taxi driver.  Tavarali has a rich experience in this field.  He is requesting this loan to repair his Tiko car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Isrrael John

texts.es: El señor Isrrael se dedica a la actividad de moldear en fibra mascaras de auto para mejorar su estética a esto le llaman tuneo de auto sus clientes son generalmente autos deportivos de diferentes clubs el señor solicita crédito para comprar un arco Voltaico y un Kid de Oxigeno para soldar las movilidades que le dejan en  su taller se encuentra ubicado en la Ciudad de El Alto, actualmente esta casado y tiene dos hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, su esposa Mary solo es ama de casa ya que tiene  que estar al cuidado de sus hijos, el domicilio del señor se encuentra en la Zona Villa Cooperativa de la Ciudad de El Alto, el Sr. Isrrael es muy solicitado por sus clientes por el buen trabajo que realiza, Se siente muy feliz por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Isrrael works as a molder in fiberglass masking of automobiles in order to improve their aesthetics. This is called auto tuning. The customers are usually from various auto sports clubs.

The gentleman is asking for a loan in order to buy an electric arc and an oxygen kit in order to weld the vehicles that they leave in his workshop located in the city of El Alto. 

He is married and has 2 children who are school age. His spouse is a housewife taking care of the 2 children. His home is in the Villa Cooperative area of the city of El Alto. 

Isrrael is very much in demand by his clients because of the good work that he does. He is very happy for the help he is given.

loans.use: to buy an electric arc and an oxygen kit

loans.name: Bobo

texts.ru: Бобо трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Бобо является руководителем дехканского хозяйства. С детства он работал на полях простым рабочим, стремился создать свое дехканское хозяйство. Его мечта осуществились, но очень много проблем возникло в связи  большой конкуренцией. Данный момент Бобо нуждается в финансовой поддержке для покупки нужных материалов для выращивания лука.
texts.en: Bobo is a hardworking and kind person.  He is married and has three children.  Bobo is a leader of a dekhan farm.  Since childhood, he has been working in the fields as a simple worker and strove to create his own dekhan farm.  His dream came to fruition, but many problems arose as a result of high competition.  Currently, Bobo needs financial assistance to purchase necessary supplies for growing onions.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and onion seeds

loans.name: Husein

texts.en:
Husein is a 37-year-old married man, the father of four gorgeous children. For 23 years, he has been repairing car wheels. This long experience has earned him his customers' trust. He opened his own business in 1992, and this step forward was very important in his life because he has proven himself among his competitors.

Husein is very skilled in his field. He previously borrowed through Kiva partner Al Majmoua, and his loan had a very impressive effect on both his social and financial situations. Husein is very optimistic about Al Majmoua loans, and that's why he is requesting a second loan to buy additional new models of tires and a special machine that he needs for his repair business. Husein will also do necessary maintenance on his house to keep his family living in a healthy environment.

Husein hopes to expand his business in the future in order to maintain a good income and provide his children with higher education.

loans.use: to purchase new models of tires and a special machine for making repairs

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is 45 years old and married to Emily. They are blessed with three children, aged 22, 12, and 10 years old. He has been running a retail shop for the past two years with a monthly income of KES 20,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his second  loan with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. Ezekiel will use the loan to buy stocks of sugar, rice, and maize meal for his shop. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a salon for his wife and to open a wholesale shop.

loans.use: To buy stocks of sugar, rice, and maize flour for his shop

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor juan se dedica a la producción de masitas como ser: conos brazos gitanos. Gel fruta, alfajores los cuales posteriormente los comercializa en los mercados y ferias de la ciudad  Cochabamba, el ambiente donde realiza la producción es en su propio domicilio ubicado en villa Israel  una zona periurbana  de Cochabamba  ubicada al sud , emprendió esta actividad hace  2 años,  vive junto a su esposa  y sus 2 hijos  en su domicilio  en alquiler ; el préstamo que solicita es para realizar la compra de insumos necesarios para incrementar su producción  el señor indica que por la temporada los productos alzan su precio por lo que necesita proveerse con materia prima como harina y manteca.
texts.en:
Juan works in the production of small cakes such as gipsy pastry cones, fruit gels, and sandwich cookies that later are sold in the markets and fairs of the city of Cochabamba. 

The setting where the production takes place is in his own residence located in a peri-urban zone of Cochabamba located in the south. He started this business 2 years ago. 

He lives with his wife and their 2 children in their rented home.

The loan that his is asking for is to buy the necessary supplies in order to increase his production. He says that in season he raises the prices of his product because of the necessity of supplying raw material such as flour and butter.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, butter, and other supplies

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: El señor Edwin se encuentra casado con la Sra. Sandra actualmente viven por la zona San Juan, la casa donde viven es de propiedad del padre de la señora Sandra, esposa del señor Edwin,  actualmente el se Edwin se dedica al servicio de mecánica en general, en las instalaciones de la oficina central de una línea de minibuses y presta este servicio a todas las unidades de la línea  y así percibiendo una buena  ganancia,  esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde hace dos años en el mismo lugar. El Sr. Edwin agradeció por la oportunidad que se le da para agrandar su negocio con los equipos a comprar que son un tanque de oxigeno, y maquina para soldar, al mismo tiempo agradeció por la rapidez en la otorgación de crédito.
texts.en:
Edwin is married to Sandra. Currently they live in the San Juan area. The house where they are living belongs to Sandra’s father, Sandra being Edward’s wife.

Currently Edwin works as a general mechanic in the central office facilities of a line of minibuses and works servicing all the units of the line and thus receives good earnings.

He has been establishing this activity for two years in the same place. Edwin gave his thanks for the opportunity given to him in order to grow his business, by buying equipment of an oxygen tank and a welding machine, and he is also grateful for the speed in granting his loan.

loans.use: to buy an oxygen tank and a welding machine

loans.name: Alvaro Enrique

texts.es: Alvaro, desde hace 25 años se dedica a vender carne de res, él aprendió  en esta época ayudando a su abuelo, de quien heredó este ofició y con el su aprendizaje. Con su negocio de expendio de carne, ha logrado sacar a su familia adelante,  la cual se encuentra conformada por su esposa y sus hoy 5 hijos en las edades de 4 a 26 años.  Cuando contrajo matrimonio y con ello le llegaron las responsabilidades propias de un jefe de hogar, no hizo otra cosa que acudir a su aprendizaje y emprender independientemente su propio negocio en casa de sus suegros, hace mas de 10 años se consiguió un local en la plaza principal de Arjona, en un terreno de su hermana donde le ha ido muy bien. En la actualidad tiene este punto comercial y distribuye en tiendas, pero su capital de trabajo es insuficiente cuando aumenta su clientela, especialmente porque las festividades le exigen tener surtido su negocio en mayor volumen. Esta es la Razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar, carne de res en mayor cantidad y lograr una mayor distribución en las tiendas donde ha hecho ya su preventa. Su sueño es ampliar sus ingresos y darle una mejor educación a sus hijos, Mientras esto ocurre su rentabilidad sobre la inversión es de 82,27% y desde aquí planea su crecimiento, fortalec iendo su negocio mediante su crédito.
texts.en: Alvaro has been selling beef for 25 years.  He learned the trade by helping his grandfather.  It is from his grandfather that he inherited this trade and under his grandfather that he learned the business.  Through his meat business, Alvaro has managed to provide for his family which consists of his wife and his five children who are between 4 and 26 years old.  When he got married and took on the responsibilities of a head of household, Alvaro turned to his knowledge of the trade and set up his own business in his in-laws' house.  More than 10 years ago, he acquired business premises in the main square in Arjona, on a plot of land belonging to his sister.  His business has done very well there.  He still has the same sales location and he distributes his produce to stores.  However, when his customer numbers increase, his working capital is not sufficient.  In particular, during holiday periods he needs to have his business stocked with larger quantities of produce.  For this reason, he is requesting a Kiva loan, which is the first loan he has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use his loan to buy beef in larger quantities and deliver larger quantities to the stores where he has already pre-sold it.  Alvaro's dream is to increase his income and provide his children with a better education.  Whilst this is happening, his investment profitability is 82.27% and it is from this point that he is planning his future, strengthening his business through his loan.

loans.use: to buy beef in larger quantities

loans.name: Suhayl

texts.ru: Сухайл уже два года как предоставляет услугу такси. Ему 28 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Он берет кредит для ремонта машины, чтобы предоставить безопасную услугу.
texts.en: Suhayl has been providing a taxi service for two years.  He is 28 years old, married and has one child.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car in order to provide a safe service.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Feliks

texts.en:
Feliks is 34 years old. He lives in Vanadzor city with his mother, wife, two children and a brother. His mother is a pensioner; his wife doesn’t work because she stays at home and takes care of their small children. 

Feliks has run his own business for five years already. He buys accessories for bunches of flowers, such as stained paper, baskets, etc., from China and wholesale fairs from Yerevan, stocks them and then distributes to the Lori region’s flower shops. Feliks’ brother helps him in business and thus they provide for their family. 

Feliks says before New Year’s holidays, flower shops demand large lots of accessories, and to fulfill their orders Feliks is asking for a 1,000,000 Armenian dram loan to buy various ribbons, accessories for flowers, baskets, etc., for his business.

loans.use: to buy various ribbons, accessories for flowers, baskets, etc., for his business.

loans.name: Noe Alexander

texts.es:
el sr. Noe Alexander tiene 24 años de edad, vive en unión libre, se graduó de Perito Mercantil y su actividad principal es el comercio, se dedica a la comercialización de electrodomésticos, tiene mas de 1 año de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, antes de crear su propio negocio trabajo por mas de 3 años como cobrador y distribuidor en una comercial que vendia los mismos productos que ahora el vende.
Noe por los momentos cuenta con aproximadamente 200 clientes en el casco urbano como en aldeas y caseríos del municipio de Las Trojes. 
gracias a este tipo de actividad genera ingresos para cumplir con los gastos del hogar,  según referencias obtenidas en la zona el sr. Noe  es una persona bien responsable y de buena conducta moral.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de electrodomesticos.
texts.en:
Noe Alexander is 24 years old and lives in a common-law relationship.  He got a degree in accounting and his principal work is business.  He works selling electrical appliances.  He has been doing this work for more than a year.  Before creating his own business he worked for more than three years as a buyer and distributor in a store that sold the same products he sells now.

At present Noe has approximately 200 customers in the central urban area and in villages and hamlets in the municipality of Las Trojes.  Thanks to this type of work he generates income to cover the household expenses.  According to references obtained in the area, Noé is a very responsible person of good moral character.

He will use the loan to buy electrical appliances.

loans.use: to buy electrical appliances.

loans.name: Saidbek

texts.ru: Саидбек житель города Вахдат. Ему 53 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Он занимается перевозкой на своем грузовом автомобиле. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 35 лет. Кредит берет для ремонта грузовика.
texts.en: Saidbek is a resident of the city of Vahdat.  He is 53 years old, married and has two children.  He is involved in transportation using his truck.  Saidbek has been in this business for 35 years.  He is requesting this loan to make repairs to his truck.

loans.use: to make repairs to his truck

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es:
El Sr. Eladio tiene 53 años, está casado con la Sra. María, tienen 2 hijos mayores que ya no dependen de él, todos ellos ya son profesionales e independientes.
Eladio tiene una despensa y comenta que su negocio tiene una antigüedad de aproximadamente 10 años. Él comenzó a trabajar en forma independiente gracias a sus ahorro que venía juntando de otros trabajos que realizaba anteriormente como guardia de seguridad. Hoy día don Eladio y la Sra. María atienden el negocio; que gracias a sus esfuerzos esta a nivel de la competencia y con un crecimiento bueno.
El Sr. Eladio solicita el crédito para que de esta forma pueda surtir su negocio con los artículos que más salida tiene, como ser harina, arroz, fideo, Bebidas y otros. El está muy agradecido por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda en su microempresa.
texts.en:
Señor Eladio is 53 years old. He is married to Señora Maria. They have two adult children who no longer depend on them; they have careers and are independent.

Eladio has a grocery store and comments that his business is about 10 years old. He began to work independently thanks to his savings, which he accumulated from other jobs that he had in the past, such as security guard. Now Don Eladio and Señora Maria tend to the business, which, thanks to their efforts is competitive and is growing well. 

Señor Eladio is applying for the loan so that he can stock his business with the most popular items, such as flour, rice, pasta, beverages, and other items. He is grateful for the opportunity that he is receiving, since the loan will be a great help to his microbusiness.

loans.use: to buy flour, rice, pasta, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Antonio tiene 63 años de edad, está casado hace 35 años con la Sra Melesia, tienen 4 hijos ya todos mayores, que trabajan ya de forma independiente.
El Sr Antonio se dedica a al servicio de moto taxi en la terminal de la cuidad de Caaguazú hace aproximadamente 5 años, y nos cuenta que le va muy bien, ya que siempre hay muy buen movimiento, y sumado a esa la buena onda y la buena atención que el da a sus clientes.
Comenta que ya tiene una clientela bien formada, es decir, algunas personas que van hasta la ciudad ya van directo a él. Don Antonio desea contar algún día con su propia línea de taxi motos para poder brindar trabajos a muchas personas.
El  solicita este crédito para la compra de un terreno ya que lo consiguió a muy buen precio y desea poder comprarlo, para que algún día pueda montar en el , la parada que sueña.
texts.en:
Antonio is 63 years old.  He has been married for 35 years to Melesia, and they have 4 children who are already grown and work independently.
Antonio has had a motor-rickshaw service in the terminal of the city of Caaguazá for approximately 5 years.  He tells us that it is going very well for him since there is always good movement.  In addition to this good wave of people, he gives good attention to his customers.
He says that he already has a well formed customer base; some people who are going to the city already come directly to him.  Antonio wants to have his own line of motor-rickshaw taxis some day in order to offer jobs to many people.
He is asking for this loan to buy a plot of land, since he has already obtained a good price.  He wants to be able to buy it, so that some day he can drive on it.  It is the taxi stop that he dreams of.

loans.use: buy a plot of land to park a motor-rickshaw in the future.

loans.name: Maria Elisa

texts.es: La señora María actualmente vive en la casa de su hija desde hace más de 20 años, su vivienda se encuentra ubicado por la zona de Jorori,  La clienta se dedica a la venta de juegos de sabanas completo, esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde mas de 8 años, con los ingresos de esta actividad ella mantiene su casa, ya que cuenta con buenos ingresos. Actualmente la Sra. María vive con su hija menor. La clienta deja a crédito sus sabanas, los pagos que se hace de las sabanas son de tres cuotas, cancelando el total adeudado a la señora en un plazo de un mes como máximo. El dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de un televisor y una heladera para su uso personal,  La solicitante agradeció a la institución por el apoyo brindado y por la rapidez en la otorgación de su crédito.
texts.en: Señora Maria has now lived in her daughter's house for more than 20 years. Her residence is located in the Jojori zone. Her work is selling sets of sheets. She has been developing this business for more than 8 years. With the income from this business, she maintains the house, since she has a good income. Now Sra. Maria lives with her younger daughter. She leaves the sheets with her customers on credit, and the payments on the sheets are made in three installments. The whole debt is paid back in a maximum time limit of a month. She will use the money from the loan to purchase a television and a refrigerator for her personal use. The applicant is grateful to the institution for the support they offer and for their speed in granting her loan.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and television.

loans.name: Johnny

texts.es: Johnny de 28 años de edad vive en el municipio de Arjona, en el departamento de Bolívar, con su cónyuge y su hijo en la edad de 3 años. El vende celulares, accesorios, discos compactos, reproductores de música, relojes, accesorios y  cargadores para celulares,  en un punto comercial. Su experiencia la tradujo en el montaje de su negocio en el municipio donde habita con su familia. El empezó trabajando en esta misma actividad  con un amigo en la ciudad de Cartagena  y una vez ganó experiencia, emprendió su propia aventura, en un sitio muy cercano a su familia, teniendo como base un capital que había ahorrado de su trabajo. Cuando empezó a vender, lo hizo trabajando con  accesorios para relojes y gradualmente ha ido adicionando otros artículos, de acuerdo con todos aquellos,  por los cuales pregunten sus clientes; así ha ganado muchos  y espera continuar incrementando su capital de trabajo,  que en muchas oportunidades se torna insuficiente para atender la demanda de su comunidad. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Maro Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará reproductores musicales, relojes accesorios para computadores, entre otros artículos que sus clientes le han encargado. En la actualidad Johnny genera una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menores del 31 % y planea desde este indicador financiero, continuar incrementando su capital con un nuevo capital de crédito.
texts.en:
Johnny, 28 lives in the town of Arjona, in Bolivar department with his wife and 3 year old son. He sells cell phones, accessories, compact discs, music players, clocks and cell phone chargers in a commercial center. He translated his experience into starting his own business in the town where he and his family live. 

He began by working in the business with a friend in the city of Cartagena and, once he gained experience, he started his own business in a location very close to his family using as working capital his savings from the earlier job. Initially he began by selling clock accessories and then gradually added other items as his customers requested them. Thus he has earned a profit and he hopes to continue expanding his working capital, which often is insufficient to meet the demands of his clients. This is exactly the reason he has come to Kiva for his first loan from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to buy music players, clocks, computer accessories, among other items that customers have ordered. 

Currently Johnny generates a profit over sales of no less than 31% and he plans, based on this financial indicator, to continue expanding his capital with a new loan account.

loans.use: to purchase music players, clocks and accessories for computers.

loans.name: Winefredo

texts.en:
Winefredo is married with eight children. Winefredo is 60 years old and lives in Lawaan, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Winefredo buy and sells rubber to earn a living and has had this business for a year. Each month, he earns 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this type of work. He has requested a loan for 50,000 PHP to purchase rubber to sell/retail.

Winefredo has been a member of PMPC for more than a year. In the future, Winefredo hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a rubber to sell/retail

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 31-year-old man. He lives with his wife and three children. He works under pressure and tries the best he can to be a good support for his family. He has owned a minimarket for the past seven years and has succeeded at work, especially after having good quality products. 

Today, he’s asking to borrow $2,100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy supplementary products and increase his inventory of goods and provisions to be able to further develop his business. In the future, he plans to enlarge his minimarket progressively, in order to be able to open his own supermarket soon.

loans.use: to buy supplementary products and increase his inventory of goods and provisions

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en: Raquel is 36 years old and lives in Isidro D. Tan, Tangub City. She is married with three children. Raquel has a general store from which she earns a living. She has had this business for three years. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store. Raquel has been a member of PMPC for two years.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

location.town: Tangub-Isidro D. Tan, Tangub City, Mindanao

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
El señor Mario es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, es comerciante, tiene una hamburguesería que esta sobre una avenida muy concurrida de esa ciudad.
Se dedica hace 3 años a la actividad en un local que esta alquilando, su sueño es que cada día le vaya mejor y que algún día quiere tener su propio local, para que de esa forma ya no tenga que pagar alquileres y ese dinero pueda invertirlo. El nos cuenta que está juntado con la señora Sunilda desde hace 5 años, tienen una hija juntos, quien es el motivo de lucha diario de ellos dos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, huevo, hortalizas, chorizos, jamón y queso y demás insumos para su hamburguesería. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
Mario is from the city Coronel Oviedo. He is a merchant and has a hamburger shop that’s on a busy avenue in the city. 

He’s been in that business for 3 years in a rented shop. He dreams that each day things may get better and that some day he has his own shop so that he’ll no longer have to pay rent and he can invest that money. He tells us that he’s been with Sunilda for 5 years, and they have a daughter together who is the reason that the two of them work so hard each day. 

He is asking for a lean to buy meat, eggs, vegetables, sausages, ham, cheese, and other ingredients for his hamburger shop. He thanks the foundation and Kiva for the opportunity they’ve given him.

loans.use: to buy meat, eggs, vegetables, sausages, ham, cheese, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es: El señor Álvaro es una persona responsable y Emprendedora que tiene como  actividad  económica el lavado de vehículos en la zona norte tiene experiencia de 5 años, el cliente es soltero, vive en alquiler gracias a su actividad logra sustentarse diariamente  ya que es la única actividad que tiene,  el crédito que solicita  es para la compra  de una aspiradora y bomba de agua para mejorar su actividad económica, ya que esto le ayudara a mejorar sus ingresos y posteriormente poder ampliar su negocio y contratar mano de obra, el Sr. Álvaro es una persona joven muy trabajadora con ganas de superación, que desea mejorar su calidad de vida de el y de toda su familia.
texts.en: Álvaro is an enterprising and responsible person who, for his job, has a car wash in the northern zone. He has 5 years of experience. He is single and rents. Thanks to his business he is able to get by each day since it’s the only business he has. The loan he’s asking for is to buy a vacuum and water pump to improve his business since this will help him increase his profit and later be able to grow his business and hire workers. Álvaro is a hardworking young person with dreams of success and who wishes to improve his quality of life and his family’s.

loans.use: to buy a water pump and vacuum for his car wash service.

loans.name: Sunday

texts.en:
Sunday is a 38-year-old married man with three children who attend school. He owns a house with electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family. 

Sunday has worked as a taxi driver for the past six years; his potential clients are the local area residents and other travelers. In addition, he owns rental houses that provide another source of income. His major challenge is the rising price of fuel. He dreams of expanding his business in the future.

With 50000 KES he wants to purchase sand, blocks and cement to renovate rental houses. He decided to join Yehu to access financial services to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase sand, blocks and cement for the renovation of rental houses.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
La señora Digna tiene 47 años de edad, vive en la colonia morazan, ahi vive con su hijo menor y se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo diario, tiene una pulperia en su casa de habitacion, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo y sus clientes son sus amigos y vecinos que le visitan a diario. El credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos, lacteos y carnes. desea surtir su negocio, las ventas estan aumentando y quiere estar preparada para ofrecerles variedad y calidad a sus clientes.
Su sueño es tener un mercadito grande.
texts.en:
Digna is 47 years old and lives in the Morazan neighborhood. She lives there with her younger son and sells goods for daily consumption. She has a store in her home. She makes sales from Monday to Sunday, and her customers are her friends and neighbors who visit her each day. She will use the loan to buy groceries, basic grains, dairy products, and meat. She would like to stock her store. Sales are increasing, and she wants to be prepared to offer her customers a variety of quality products. 

Her dream is to have a large store.

loans.use: to buy groceries, basic grains, dairy products, and meat.

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en:
Ameen is a 24-year-old single man from Sahab, Jordan. Ameen sells tobacco and perfumes and he is requesting a loan of 500 Jordanian dinars to purchase perfumes and tobacco for trading purposes.

Ameen is looking to expand his project and open a store for storage purposes.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes and tobacco for trading purposes.

loans.name: Yodgorbek

texts.ru: Ёдгорбек целеустремленный и трудолюбивый парень. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Ёдгорбек выращивает разные виды овощей, а потом после сборки урожая продает на рынке. Ёдгорбек запрашивает займ для покупки пестицидов и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Yodgorbek is a very hardworking and goal-oriented young man.  He has been involved in agriculture for more than six years.  He grows various kinds of vegetables, which he sells at the market after the harvest.  Yodgorbek is requesting a loan to purchase pesticides and mineral fertilizers.  He looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a 32-year-old Lebanese married man who lives with his wife and four children who are still attending school. He finds it really hard to cover their expenses because of the high cost of living. That’s why he decided to start his own business in 2003. He delivers diesel upon request to the neighboring villages. In parallel, he’s renting a department which he owns and benefits from its rental fees.  Today, he has the intention to borrow $1800 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase an extra quantity of diesel to respond rapidly to his customers' demands. This will augment his sales therefore increase his revenues. In the future, he plans to open his own diesel station.

loans.use: to purchase an extra quantity of diesel to respond rapidly to his customers' demands

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 30-year-old businessman who is married to Mary who is a farmer. They are blessed with two children. He has been operating a motorcycle transportation business for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 10,500 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his third loan term with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. David will use the loan to buy another new motor bike. With the anticipated profits from the business, he will educate his children. 

He hopes to buy a taxi which will increase his income.

loans.use: To buy a motor bike

loans.name: Tarek

texts.en: Tarek is a 30-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. He is the main source of income for his family and has big responsibilities to care for them.  He has been selling fruits and vegetables for the past eleven years.  He has his own van in which he transports his products all over the villages.  Today, he is requesting to borrow $2900 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase more fruits and vegetables, plus perform the needed maintenance on his van so he can carry on his work properly. In the future, he plans to enhance his work and deliver his products the fastest he can.

loans.use: buy fruits and vegetables and perform maintenance on his van

loans.name: Sandra Lucía

texts.es:
Sandra Lucía se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a sus 2 hijos, pues desde hace algún tiempo se separó de su esposo y quedó como madre soltera cabeza de familia, sin embargo, esto no le afectado pues ha mantenido el mismo empuje y coraje para seguir adelante. Hace aproximadamente 6 años empezó con la venta de mercancía por catálogo, como por ejemplo lociones, shampoo, cremas de manos, entre otros productos de uso personal, y gracias a esto ha podido generar los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos de su hogar. Sandra Lucía ha visto como su negocio ha ido creciendo poco a poco, sin embargo, las condiciones del invierno hacen que tenga que frenar el ritmo de su negocio, pues vive en una vereda y su desplazamiento es muy difícil en épocas de lluvias. Ahora, Sandra Lucía esta conquistando nuevos clientes, por lo que ha tenido grandes pedidos por parte de ellos, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar estos productos. Por esto, Sandra Lucía esta en búsqueda de un préstamo el cual le permita acceder a la compra de estos productos y satisfacer los pedidos de sus nuevos clientes, y poder así seguir incrementando las ventas de su negocio y por ende sus ingresos. 
Sandra Lucía tiene el sueño de que su negocio le pueda brindar una estabilidad económica y sus hijos puedan gozar de esto, ya que ella quiere que puedan acceder a la mejor educación posible, situación que hasta el momento no ha sido posible.
texts.en:
Sandra Lucia is known as a hard working person who is devoted to her two children, as a while ago she separated from her husband and has been a single mother and head of the family since. However, this has not affected her as she has kept her strength and courage to get ahead.

About six years ago she started selling catalogue products, such as lotions, shampoo, hand creams, among other personal use products. Thanks to this she has been able to generate enough income to cover the costs of the house. Sandra Lucia has seen how her business has slowly grown.

However, winter conditions force her to slow down the pace of the business. She lives in a district where the rainy season hinders her movement. Now, Sandra Lucia is making new customers and has large orders from them, but she does not have enough capital to buy these products. For this reason Sandra Lucia is looking for a loan which will allow her to buy these products and cover her new customers' orders. This way she will be able to continue increasing her business sales and as a result, her income.

Sandra Lucia dreams that her business will offer her economic stability, which will benefit her children also, as she wants the best education possible for them. This until now has not been possible.

loans.use: to buy personal use products in order to meet her customers orders.

loans.name: Eucaris

texts.es: Eucaris viene trabajando desde hace 6 años debido a que los ingresos que generaba su esposo no eran suficientes para sostener los gastos del hogar, donde conviven con sus 3 hijos, por lo que Eucaris entonces inició con la actividad de la venta de productos por catálogo como ropa y productos de uso personal. Eucaris tiene el gran sueño de que sus 3 hijos puedan acceder a la mejor educación posible, sin embargo, los bajos ingresos de su hogar no se lo han permitido, y es por esta razón que Eucaris se esfuerza cada vez más con el objetivo de brindarles a sus 3 hijos todo lo que necesitan. El negocio de Eucaris ha venido presentando grandes incrementos en las ventas, pues la calidad de sus productos y las buenas técnicas para vender Eucaris marcan la diferencia entre sus clientes, es por esto que Eucaris tiene grandes pedidos que satisfacer, a tal punto que no tiene el capital completo para la compra de dichos pedidos; es por esto que Eucaris espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de esta mercancía y así poder cumplir a sus clientes con los pedidos hechos. Eucaris espera que con el incremento de sus ingresos, sus hijos, su esposo y ella aumenten considerablemente su calidad de vida, y puedan cumplir todos sus sueños.
texts.en:
Eucaris has been working for the last six years, since the sole income of her husband was not enough to cover the household bills, where they live with their three children. Because of this, Eucaris started selling catalogue products, such as clothes and personal use products. 

Eucaris dreams that her three children receive the best education possible. However, the low income to the household has not allowed this and for this reason Eucaris makes more and more of an effort to provide her three children with all that they need. 

Eucaris' business has seen a great increase in its sales due to the quality of her products and her good selling techniques, which makes a difference to her customers. So Eucaris has large orders to cover; to the point that she does not have enough capital to buy these products. For this reason Eucaris hopes that a loan will allow her to buy this stock and complete her customers' already made orders. Eucaris hopes that with the increase in income, her children, her husband and her will considerably improve their quality of life and that they can fulfil all their dreams.

loans.use: to buy personal use products such as clothes, lotions and other items.

loans.name: Benito De Jesus

texts.es:
Benito es conocido en su sector por ser una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia, la cual es el motor para que diariamente trabaje con esmero en su tienda. Benito inició su tienda desde hace algún tiempo debido a que en su sector no había una tienda que pudiera abastecer todas las necesidades de las personas del sector, por lo que Benito fue pionero en su sector y gracias a esto consiguió una gran clientela. Benito siempre ha querido que su esposa y sus 3 hijos tengan todo lo necesario, y siempre anda en búsqueda de mejorarles su calidad de vida. El gran sueño de Benito es comprar el local donde tiene la tienda, y poder montar un negocio mucho mejor, donde pueda hacer reformas locativas, por esto siempre busca incrementar sus ingresos.
Su tienda la mantiene muy bien surtida de toda clase de mercancía, pero presenta el inconveniente de que el exhibidor para los productos que requieren ser refrigerados ya no le puede almacenar más productos, y Benito se ve en la obligación de no poder vender más productos de este tipo. Con el ánimo de mejorar esta situación, Benito busca comprar un exhibidor refrigerado, sin embargo, no cuenta con el dinero disponible para ello; por esto, Benito aspira a que un préstamo le permita acceder a este exhibidor refrigerado y pueda almacenar más productos que requieran refrigeración, y así ofrecer más productos a sus clientes. Benito afirma que con este exhibidor sus ventas aumentarán considerablemente, pues sus clientes siempre le sugieren que venda más de estos productos que requieren ser refrigerados. Benito aspira a que con este incremento en sus ingresos, pueda cumplir el sueño de comprar el local donde esta su negocio, y con mejorare la calidad de vida a su esposa y a sus 3 hijos, a quienes les quiere brindar la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Benito is know in his neighbourhood for being a hard working person who is devoted to his family. His family is the reason that he works diligently every day in his store. Benito set his store up some time ago as there were no such shop in his neighbourhood that could cover all the needs of the inhabitants of the neighbourhood. So Benito was a pioneer in his area and thanks to this he acquired a large clientele. Benito has always wanted his wife and three children to have everything they need and he is always looking for ways to improve their quality of life. Benito's biggest dream is to buy the property where he has his store and set up a much better business there, where he can make improvements. This is the reason why he is looking to increase his income.

His store has a wide range of all types of stock, but he feels he lacks a cabinet where he can put products which require refrigeration. As he cannot store this products, at the moment Benito has had to stop selling this type of product. Hoping to improve his situation, Benito is looking to buy a refrigerated cabinet, but he does not have the necessary money available. For this reason Benito is hoping that a loan will allow him to buy this refrigerated cabinet to store more products which require refrigeration, therefore offering more products to his customers. Benito states that this cabinet will increase his sales considerably, as his customers are always suggesting he sell more refrigerated products. Benito hopes to be able to increase his income, fulfil his dream of buying the property where his store is and improving the quality of life of his wife and three children, offering them the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerated cabinet which will allow him to have more chilled products on sale.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 36-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and one school-aged child.

In order to live properly and be able to pay his child’s school fees, Hasan works hard and nonstop. He’s an independent contractor specializing in floor cleaning and has been working in this area since 1991. Today, he’s asking for a loan of $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a new floor cleaning machine. He notes that this machine will facilitate his work and let him take on more projects without facing problems. In the future, he plans to renew his tools and take bigger projects.

loans.use: to purchase a new floor cleaning machine

loans.name: Oudai

texts.en: Oudai is a 26-year-old Lebanese single man. He lives with his one only parent.  He combines forces with his siblings who live outside the country and send a monthly amount in order to fulfill the family's needs. In 2004, Oudai started his own business as a barber and opened his own salon. He’s very glad for what he has attained so far. Today, he’s requesting to borrow $1100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new barbering tools and change his salon’s decoration. This will help him attract more customers and therefore increase his earnings. In the future, he plans to learn new haircut designs and improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase new barbering tools and change his salon’s decoration

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en: Abbas is a 32-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children who are still studying. He’s considered as the main source of income for his family and they really depend on him. He has been working as a van driver since 1999. He works independently, on a free-lance basis. Today, he’s in need of a loan of $1600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to pay his van’s mechanic fees, perform the needed maintenance on it, in addition to painting. Otherwise, he may lose his loyal and trusted customers. In the future, he plans to organize tourist trips all over the country.

loans.use: to pay his van’s mechanic fees in addition to body work and painting

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 32-year-old Lebanese single man who lives with his only one parent and two siblings. After finding it hard to cover his family expenses, he decided to double his effort and combine forces with his siblings. He started working as a painter in 1992 on a free-lance basis. He’s a reputable man, known for his good and well-organized work.  Today, he’s asking for a loan of $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to a buy new painting tools to improve his business.  This Kiva loan will allow him to start his new business,  else he won’t be able to carry on his work as it should be done. In the future, he plans to open his own painting shop.

loans.use: buy tools for painting

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталье нужен кредит, чтобы обновить ассортимент женской одежды: халатов, нижнего белья, колготок и т.п.
Благодаря предыдущему кредиту в бизнес Натальи расширился, увеличились продажи и соответственно доход. 
Полученные дополнительные деньги Наталья потратила на улучшение условий проживания: провела индивидуальное отопление, сделала мелкий ремот.
texts.en:
Natalya needs a loan to update the assortment of women's clothing: Gowns, underwear, pantyhoses and so on. 

Thanks to the previous loan, Natalya's business expanded, and revenues and sales increased. Natalya used the extra money on improving living conditions: Installed individual heating and made small repairs.

loans.use: to purchase new products

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is a 29-year-old single man who owns a house with electricity and piped water.  His greatest monthly expense is the high cost of transport.

Jackson has operated as a taxi driver for the past two years. His potential clients are tourists visiting the coastal region. He faces a major challenge of seasonality. He dreams of owning another motor vehicle for his business.

With the KES 40,000 he wants to purchase spare parts to repair his taxi. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson is 32 years old. He sells men's and women's suits to earn a living. He has been in the business for four years. He describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business to wholesale in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings (KES).

loans.use: To buy men's and women's suits to sell.

loans.name: Granton

texts.en:
Granton is a married man with three children, all of whom attend school. His wife is a businesswoman who contributes to the provision of family basic needs. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food for his family and school fees for his children. 

Granton has operated a motorbike transportation business for the past three years; his potential clients are local people at the market area. He faces a major challenge of seasonality where there are no clients in some months of the year. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the Kshs 35,000 loan, he wants to purchase spare parts for his motorbike and pay for the repair of his motorbike. He decided to join Yehu because it has fair terms and conditions.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his motorbike and pay for the repair of his motorbike.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is thirty-one years old and he is married with three children. He runs a hardware shop in Emali. William has been in the business for four years now and gets a monthly income of  KES. 24,700.


This will be William’s first loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to purchase more stock for his  hardware shop for resale. With the profit that he will get, he wants to expand his hardware business. 


In future he wants to be able to expand his hardware shop into a wholesale one.

loans.use: To purchase more stock for his hardware shop.

loans.name: Collins

texts.en: Collins is 44 years old with five children living in Hioma, Uganda. He has been running a produce business for over ten years now. He faces the challenges of high price fluctuations and the unpredictable seasonal weather. His family's goal is to educate his children, and his business goal is to expand his business to new markets. Collins intends to use the loan to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize.

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdou est un jeune homme de 36 ans qui habite sur le territoire  sénégalais. Il est marié et s’active depuis plus de 15 ans dans le secteur du commerce.  Il pratique la vente de salons, lits armoires, ardoises  et réfrigérateurs. C’est une activité qu’il a choisi sous l’influence de son père. Il est sociétaire de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis septembre 2011. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’acquisition de quelques mobiliers (lits armoires, fauteuils) destinés a la vente. Son objectif principal  est d’accroitre ses bénéfices.
texts.en:
Abdou is a young man who lives in Senegal. He is 36 years old. He is married and has been working in retail for over 15 years.

He sells living room furniture, wall beds, slates, and refrigerators. He was influenced by his father in choosing this line of work. He has been a member of a branch of the U-IMCEC since September 2011.

He is asking for a loan of 500,000 frs which he plans to use to buy furniture items (wall beds, armchairs) which he will then resell. His main goal is to increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy furniture to resell

loans.name: Moussa

texts.fr: Monsieur Moussa habite au Sénégal. Il est âgé de 38 ans. Il évolue dans le secteur du commerce depuis plus de 10 ans. Il gère une boutique dans la localité ou il vit. Il est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis février 2009. Il a déjà remboursé  2 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de denrées alimentaires qui seront  destinés a renforcer le stock de sa boutique. Son objectif  est d’accroitre ses bénéfices  pour ainsi  augmenter son capital de commerce
texts.en: Moussa lives in Senegal. He is 38 years old. He has advanced in the commerce trade for more than ten years. He manages a shop in the area where he lives. He has been a member of one of the branches of U-IMCEC since February 2009. He has already reimbursed two previous loans. He is requesting a 500,000 Frs loan in order to purchase basic food products; these will be added to the stock of his shop. His goal is to increase his profits in order to then increase his working capital.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale

loans.name: Ana Sol

texts.es: Ana Sol es un persona que es reconocida en su familia y en su sector por ser trabajadora, dedicada y amorosa con sus 3 hijos y su esposo. Ana Sol siempre ha querido contribuir con ingresos para su hogar, pues quiere brindarles todo lo que necesitan sus hijos y con los ingresos que genera su esposo no es suficiente para que ellos puedan acceder a una excelente educación, o tengan cubiertas a cabalidad todas sus necesidades. Es por esto que Ana Sol inició vendiendo mercancía de uso personal a sus amigos y familiares y posteriormente empezó con la venta de helados (ice cream) en su sector, actividad que le ha permitido generar mayores ingresos y le ha hecho ganar una muy buena reputación en su sector, pues sus productos son de excelente calidad.
