Ana Sol manifiesta que entre más ingresos genere para su hogar, mejor calidad de vida tendrán ella y su esposo, pero lo que más le interesa es que sus hijos tengan el mejor bienestar posible, empezando por la mejor educación posible. Con el ánimo entonces de generar un poco más de ingresos para su hogar, Ana Sol esta en la búsqueda de comprar unas vitrinas de exhibición para sus helados (ice cream), y donde también pueda incorporar más productos de los que ofrece a sus clientes actualmente. Sin embargo, debido a que en esta temporada Ana Sol se encuentra pagando el estudio de sus hijos, y pagando la mercancía que ha comprado a sus proveedores, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para comprar sus vitrinas de exhibición, por lo que aspira a un préstamo que le permita acceder a la compra de estas vitrinas de exhibición y le permita seguir vendiendo cada vez más para seguir cumpliendo su sueño de que sus hijos tengan el mayor bienestar posible en sus vidas.
texts.en:
Ana Sol is a person who is recognized in her family and in her work sector for being dedicated and loving with her three children and her husband.  Ana Sol has always wanted to contribute toward household expenses because she wants to provide everything necessary for her children and the income her husband earns is insufficient for them to be able to access an excellent education or to be able to cover all their needs.  Because of this, Ana Sol started selling personal use merchandise to friends and relatives and later on started to sell ice-cream in her neighborhood, an activity that has allowed her to earn higher income and to attain a very good reputation in the sector because her products are excellent quality.

Ana Sol states that the more income she generates for her home the better quality of life she and her husband will have but what most interests her is that her children have the best possible wellbeing starting with the best possible education.

Aiming at earning a bit more household income, Ana Sol is looking to buy display cases for her ice-cream where she can also incorporate other products she currently offers her customers.  However, because during this season Ana Sol is paying her children’s school fees and also paying for merchandise she’s purchased from her suppliers, she does not have sufficient capital to buy her display cases so is hoping for a loan that will allow her to have access to these display cases and that allows her to continue selling more each time thus reaching her dream of her children having the best possible wellbeing in their lives.

loans.use: to buy a display case.

loans.name: Mbaye Gueye

texts.fr: Monsieur Mbaye est âgé de 57 ans. Il est marié et exerce  l’activité de chauffeur de taxi depuis 10 ans.  Il a choisi son activité par nécessité dans  le but de pouvoir prendre en charge ses propres besoins ainsi que ceux de sa famille. Il est membre d’un  guichet  de l’UMCEC de  la localité ou il habite depuis janvier 2006. Il a déjà remboursé 4 prêts  antérieurs au sein de l’institution. Il sollicite un crédit de 425 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’un moteur. Son ambition est de remplacer le moteur de son taxi pour une meilleure rentabilité de son taxi.
texts.en: Mbaye is 57 years old and married. He has been driving a taxi for the past ten years. He chose this activity out of necessity to be able to provide for his own needs as well as those of his family. He is a member of a branch of UIMCEC in the town where he has lived since January 2006. He has already repaid four previous loans from the institution. He is requesting a loan of 425,000 francs to buy an engine. His aim is to replace the engine in his taxi in order to be able to make more money from his taxi business.

loans.use: to buy an engine

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es:
Samuel es un joven de 21 años de edad que es todo un adulto ya que es muy responsable y sobre todo honrado, el como todo buen peruano le gusta mucho nuestra comida y el platillo que le agrada mucho es la Carapulcra, en sus tiempos libres es disfruta de escuchar música sobre todo cuando esta de mal humor porque lo tranquiliza mucho; el tiene estudios superiores pero al no encontrar trabajo decidió tener su negocio propio.

Samuel se dedica actualmente a la venta de zapatos, el es muy luchador le dedica a u negocio alrededor de 9 horas y puede atender hasta 20 clientes de manera diaria, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene muy buen gusto para los zapatas y a sus clientes les gustan sus productos.

Samuel esta muy contento y agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá comprar sandalias para temporada de verano, con esta mejoría el tendrá mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y con ello aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida y sobre todo seguir ahorrando para poder cumplir su gran sueño:”Tener su empresa de Calzados”.
texts.en:
Samuel, 21, is a young man who is very much an adult since he’s very responsible and above all honest.  Like all good Peruvians, he enjoys our cuisine very much and the dish he likes best is “Carapulcra” [pork and chicken stew]. In his free time he enjoys listening to music especially when he’s in a bad mood because it calms him down a lot.  He has higher education but because he did not find a job he decided to open his own business.

Samuel is currently selling shoes.  He’s very tenacious and dedicates about 9 hours daily to his work; he’s able to tend to about 20 customers daily and he believes that he does well because his taste in shoes is very good and his customers like his products very much.

Samuel is very happy and grateful for his Kiva loans because thanks to the help he’ll be able to buy sandals for the summer season.  With this improvement he’ll have a wider variety of products to offer his customers and increase his income to improve his quality of life and above all continue to save to reach his great dream: “To have his footwear firm.”

loans.use: to buy sandals for the summer season.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto ha sido una persona muy trabajadora durante toda su vida, y es gracias a esta cualidad que ha podido salir adelante y brindarle a su esposa el mayor bienestar posible. Humberto anteriormente trabajaba en la limpieza de un restaurante, sin embargo, el mal trato que le daban sus jefes y lo menospreciado que lo hacían sentir, hizo que Humberto decidiera independizarse y generar sus ingresos por un camino distinto. Es entonces como Humberto empezó a vender tintos en un carrito, y poco a poco fue incrementándole los productos que ofrecía a sus clientes. Los clientes de Humberto lo reconocen porque sus productos son de muy buena calidad, y la atención que les da Humberto siempre es la mejor. Humberto manifiesta que quiere que su negocio crezca y pueda montar una cafetería en un futuro, para brindarles empleo a muchas personas y que no tengan que pasar por las manos de unos malos jefes. Además de esto, Humberto también sueña con que su negocio le dé tan buenos ingresos que pueda conseguir su casa propia y le permita brindarle a su esposa una mayor comodidad y una mejor calidad de vida. En vísperas de que sus ventas aumenten Humberto quiere hacerle algunas mejoras al carrito donde vende sus tintos y otros productos, pues actualmente su traslado es muy incómodo y le impide llegar a diferentes lugares. Es por esto que Humberto aspira que un préstamo le permita acceder a realizarle mejoras a su carrito de ventas y también le permita comprar más productos para ofrecerle a sus clientes una mayor variedad, y de esta manera aumentar significativamente sus ventas, pues logrará llegar a más lugares y con una mejor oferta de productos.
texts.en: Humberto has been a very hard-working person his whole life.  Thanks to this quality, he has been able to get ahead in life and provide for his wife's well-being.  Humberto used to work as a cleaner in a restaurant.  However, owing to the bad treatment that he received from his bosses and the fact that they didn't value him, he decided to start working for himself and make income on a different path.  Humberto started selling coffee from a small cart.  He gradually increased the products that he sells to his customers.  Humberto is well-known to his customers because his products are very good quality and he always provides them with the very best customer service.  Humberto says that he would like his business to grow and would like to set up a cafe in the future so that he can provide work for many people and save them from having to work for bad bosses.  In addition, Humberto also dreams of his business providing him with good income so that he can acquire his own home and provide his wife with more comforts and a better quality of life.  Whilst waiting for his sales to increase, Humberto would like to make some improvements to the little cart from which he sells his coffee and other products because, right now, it is very uncomfortable to transport and this stops him from making sales in different places.  Humberto is requesting a loan which will allow him to make improvements to his sales cart and which will also enable him to buy more products to offer his customers.  In this way, his sales will increase significantly as he will manage to get to more places and have a better selection of products to offer.

loans.use: to make improvements to the cart from which he sells his coffee and to buy more products so that he can offer a wider variety

loans.name: William Ivan

texts.es: William se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a buscar generar sus propios ingresos. Es por esto que ha montado varios negocios de diferentes características, como son un servicio de lavadoras, venta de arepas, y últimamente un negocio de venta de calzado. William aprendió la actividad de la venta de calzado cuando trabajó en un almacén de estas características, y gracias a la experiencia que adquirió allí montó su propio negocio de venta de calzado. William es reconocido por ser una persona que siempre ha querido brindar el mayor bienestar posible a sus familiares y su esposa, y es por estos por quienes trabaja fuertemente en su negocio. William sueña con ser un gran empresario, con que su negocio crezca y se consolide en su sector, y que sus clientes lo tengan como un referente a la hora de comprar el calzado. Sus clientes manifiestan que William vende unos productos de excelente calidad, y además su servicio siempre es el mejor respecto a otros almacenes. William sueña con que cuando su negocio tenga grandes niveles de ventas, pueda contratar a muchas personas que no encuentren una oportunidad de empleo en otras empresas, y el les pueda impactar su vida mejorándoles su calidad de vida. Con la llegada de la temporada escolar, William requiere de la compra de calzado escolar, sin embargo, en el momento se encuentra sin el capital suficiente para comprar la cantidad que sus clientes demandan. Es por esto que William aspira a que un préstamo le permita acceder a comprar el calzado escolar para la temporada, y así su negocio siga creciendo para que genere grandes ingresos y pueda cumplir su sueño de mejorarle la calidad de vida a muchas personas.
texts.en:
William has dedicated a great part of his life looking to generate his own income.  That is why he has started various different businesses like washing machine services, selling “arepas” (stuffed corn patties), and lastly, a business selling shoes.

William learned the business of selling shoes when he worked in this type of store.  Thanks to the experience that he got, he started his own business selling shoes.  William is known for being a person who has always given his wife and relatives the best well-being possible.  It is for them that he works extremely hard in his business.

William dreams of being a great businessman, of having his business grow and get stronger, and that his customers keep him in mind when they buy shoes.  His customers say that William sells excellent quality products.  Also, his service is always the best compared to other stores.

William dreams that when his business has high levels of sales he will be able to hire a lot of people who cannot find employment at other businesses.  He will be able to impact their lives by improving their standard of living.

With the arrival of the school year, William needs to buy school shoes.  However, he does not now have enough money to buy the quantity that his customers demand.  That is why William hopes that a loan will allow him to buy seasonal school shoes.  That way his business will continue growing in order to generate great income.  Then he will be able to fulfill his dream of improving the quality of life for many people.

loans.use: to buy school shoes to sell to his customers at the start of the school season.

loans.name: Arshak

texts.en:
Arshak continues with his food and household goods trading.  Now his wife is working at a women rights protection center as a coordinator and helps her husband to support their family. 

With his first Kiva loan, Arshak used it to increase his shop’s assortment of goods.  Now he needs a 1.000.000 AMD loan to buy household goods, beverage foods, sausages and confectionery for his shop.

loans.use: To buy household goods, beverage foods, sausages and confectionery for his shop.

loans.name: Abu

texts.en: This is forty-five-year-old Abu. Born in Makeni city, Abu is a husband and a father. He is married to a trader. Abu wants a loan of 5,000,000 SLL in order to invest in his business. He sells clothing such as jeans, blouses, t-shirts, vests, sneakers, and sandals. Abu has been a businessman for 19 years now. However, his business has been growing at a very slow pace due to the lack of sufficient capital. Thus he has come to SMT and Kiva lenders to apply for a loan in order to expand his business. With this loan, he will travel to neighboring Guinea and buy the above mentioned items at wholesale prices to add to his business.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as jeans, blouses, t-shirts, vests, sneakers, and sandals at wholesale prices to add to his business.

loans.name: Gerardo Geronimo

texts.es:
Gerardo Gerónimo tiene 42 años vive en unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con la compañera y los hijos de 11 y 14 años de edad en ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LA UNION, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías, Perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol.

Gerardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para trabajar en la agricultura para comprar semillas, líquidos, urea, insectisidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar arrendar más terrenos.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas, la langosta y cogollera.

El sueño es comprar una finca. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, dialogar con la familia.
texts.en:
Gerardo Gerónimo is 42 years old, and lives in a common-law marriage.  He has two children, and he lives with his wife and children, aged 11 and 14, in  Ventanas, in the Los Ríos province.

He is a member of the La Union communal bank, which is located in the Aguas Frías district, which is in the Ventanas canton.  Members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agricultural work, growing corn, rice and pigeon peas.

Gerardo works in agriculture, growing corn.  He makes his purchases and his sales in Ventanas.

He is requesting the loan for his agricultural work, to buy seeds, liquids, urea, and insecticides.  With the help of the loan, he will be able to lease additional fields.

The challenges that he faces are pests, locusts and budworm.

His dream is to purchase a farm,  In his free time, he enjoys relaxing and chatting with his family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, liquids, urea, and insecticides

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos tiene 29 años estado civil actual union libre no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LA UNION, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías, Perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, frejol.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, insumos, líquidos para la maleza. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá arrendar más terrenos para poder sembrar más.

Los desafíos a los que se presenta son las plagas, la langosta. El sueño es comprarse una finca . 

En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos, 29, is in a common-law marriage but has no children.  He lives with his wife in Ventanas in  Los Rios province.

He is a member of the communal bank "La Union," which is located in the Recinto Aguas Frias, which is part of the canton of Ventanas.  The members of this communal bank work in short-cycle agriculture cultivating corn, rice and beans.

Juan is a farmer who cultivates corn.  He purchases his supplies and sells his produce in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, supplies and liquid weed-killer.  With this help of this loan, he will be able to rent more land and cultivate more crops.

He faces challenges such as the diseases and locusts that can affect his crops.  His dream is to buy his own farm.

In his free time, he enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies and liquid weed-killer.

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa is a married woman with eight children, all of whom have completed school. She owns a house with electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for her family. 

Mejumaa has operated a rental house business for the past 10 years. Her potential clients are the local area residents. She faces a major challenge of tenants not paying their rent on time. She dreams of owning other rental houses.

With the loan of KES 100,000, Mejumaa wants to purchase ceiling boards and paint and to pay laborers to renovate her rental house. She decided to join Yehu because they offer quality financial services.

loans.use: To purchase ceiling boards and paint and to pay laborers to renovate her rental house.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: La señora Sandra es casada tiene 2 hijos que son independientes, ella vive en casa propia ubicado en la zona central de la localidad de Sacaba,  la señora Sandra se dedica a la venta de comida en un lugar muy comercial de la localidad de Sacaba, los días lunes, miércoles y viernes. Ella ofrece todo tipo de comidas entre caldos y segundos, el préstamo es para la compra de una heladera para poder mantener sus verduras y otros insumos, y así de esta manera  poder incrementar su capital de trabajo y también con el saldo  compra de insumos para la elaboración de comidas, la Sra. Sandra es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora esta es la única actividad con la que se sustenta.
texts.en:
Señora Sandra is married with two children who are financially independent.  She lives in her own home, located in the centre of Sacaba.  Señora Sandra works selling food in a very commercial part of Sacaba, on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays.  She offers all different kinds of food including soups and main dishes.  The loan is for the purchase of a fridge to keep her vegetables and other ingredients, and in this way to be able to increase her working capital and with the remainder to be able to purchase ingredients for making her food.

Señora Sandra is a very responsible and hard-working person.  This is the only activity with which she supports herself.

loans.use: to buy a fridge

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер житель района Шахритус. Возраст, 29 лет. Женат. Имеет одного ребенка. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам Алишер занимается растениеводством. Он арендует участок земли, где сеет зерновые и бахчевые культуры для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений, топлива и семян картошки.
texts.en: Alisher is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 29 years old, married and has one child.  His wife works at a dekhan farm.  Alisher is involved in agriculture.  He leases a plot of land, where he sows cereal and melon crops for sale.  He has been involved in this business for four years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers, fuel and potato seeds.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers, fuel and potato seeds

loans.name: Nimon

texts.ru: Нимон житель района Шахритус. Возраст, 45 лет. Женат. Имеет семерых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Старший сын находится в России. Сам Нимон занимается скотоводством у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Nimon is a resident of the Shahrituz district.  He is 45 years old, married and has seven children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Their oldest son is in Russia.  Nimon is involved in animal husbandry at home.  He has been in this business for six years.  Nimon is requesting this loan for the purchase of several heads of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase several heads of cattle

loans.name: Nosir

texts.ru: Носир отец черырёх детей, жена работает в больнице медсестрой. Уже пять лет , как Носир работает частным таксистом по городу Худжанду. У него бортовая машина, на которой он возит груз у заказщиков. Но проблема у Носира в том, что ему необходимо отремонтировать мотор и обновить шины .Носир хороший семьянин и ответственный папа.Его дети учатся в средних школах города.Старшую дочь он хочет после окончания школы устроить учится в ВУЗ.А для этого как говорит Носир ему нужно усердно работать и копить деньги.Он благодарен организации за доверие и финансирование.
texts.en: Nosir is a father of four children, and his wife works as a nurse at a hospital.  It has been five years since Nosir started working as a private taxi driver in the city of Khujand.  He has a van that he uses to transport loads for customers.  But Nosir's problem is that he needs to repair the engine and buy new tires.  Nosir is a good family man and a responsible father. His children attend secondary schools in the city.  He wants his oldest daughter to go to a university after finishing school.  And for this, as Nosir says, he needs to work hard and save money.  He is grateful to the organization for the trust and financing.

loans.use: to repair vehicle engine and buy new tires

loans.name: Varuzhan

texts.ru:
Варужан  родился в 1966 г в городе Капане. Он окончил Ереванский Политехнический институт, где получил специальность инженера-радиотехника  
Варужан женат и у него двое детей: сын и дочь. Сын Варужана учится на платном отделении Ереванского Медицинского Университета, а дочь учится в средней школе. 
Варужан долгие годы работал спасателем в Министерстве Чрезвычайных Ситуаций. С 2011 года он занимается частным предпринимательством в арендованном помещении: он продает галантерею (сумки, школьные портфели, пояса, зонтики), часы, очки и т.д. Товары для магазина Варужан закупает раз в месяц на оптовых рынках города  Еревана. У Варужана много постоянных клиентов, которые предпочитают делать свои покупки именно из его магазина, благодаря хорошему качеству товаров и доброжелательности самого Варужана. Варужан работает без выходных и благодаря выручке от своего бизнеса, он содержит свою семью и платит за обучение сына в университете.
Варужану необходим кредит на сумму 1.000.000 армянских драм для закупки большой партии товаров: сумок, часов и ремней в преддверии Новогодних и Рождественских праздников. Именно эти товары хорошо продаются в качестве подарков в данный период времени.
texts.en: Varuzhan was born in 1966 in the city of Kapan.  He graduated from the Yerevan Polytechnic Institute, where he obtained a speciality of engineer-radio technician.  Varuzhan is married and has two children -  a son and a daughter.  His son attends a paid division of the Yerevan Medical University, and daughter goes to a secondary school.  Varuzhan spent many years working as a rescuer at the Ministry of Emergency Situations.  Since 2011, he has been involved in a private entrepreneurship at a leased space, where he sells accessories (purses, school briefcases, belts, umbrellas, watches, glasses, etc.).  Varuzhan buys merchandise for his store once per month at wholesale markets in Yerevan.  He has many regular customers, who prefer to make their purchases specifically at his store, due to the quality of merchandise and Varuzhan's kindness.  He works without days off and is able to support his family, and pay for his son's university education, thanks to the earnings from this business.  Varuzhan needs a loan in the sum of 1,000,000 Armenia dram for the purchase of a large inventory of merchandise, such as purses, watches and belts, in anticipation of the New Year and Christmas holidays.  These types of merchandise sell especially well as presents at the current time.

loans.use: to buy a large inventory of purses, watches and belts

loans.name: Bayindur

texts.en: Bayindur lives in the Shirak region of Armenia in the village of Haykavan.  He is married with three children – two daughters (22 and 23 years old) and an eight-year-old son.  Bayindur has a high school education and has been working on the family farm for the past 36 years.  Bayindur also supports his brother living in Gyumri with produce grown on the family farm.  Bayindur would like to expand his business and is looking for a loan.  He will purchase potato seeds and calves.  According to his plan, this investment will increase the family income by 20 percent.  The conditions in Haykavan are favorable for breeding cattle and growing an agriculture business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and calves

loans.name: Nyamaa

texts.en:
Mr Nyamaa, twenty-seven, is a transportation driver in a private company.  He has started his job this year in this company and has been a driver for seven years.  Nymaa lives with his son and wife in the Ger district, the nomadic Mongolian traditional tent in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.
 
Lately his transportation truck has broken and most of its parts are damaged.  He thinks it will influence his business badly.  Therefore he is taking a loan to purchase the necessary spare parts for his truck repairs.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary spare parts for his truck repairs.

loans.name: Kamo

texts.en: Kamo is from the village of Torosgyugh. He is married with two sons (21-year-old twins).  He has a secondary school education and has been farming for over 20 years.  In addition to supporting his family, Kamo helps his relatives living in the city.  He considers himself a hardworking, honest person.  Kamo dreams that his children will graduate from university and get good jobs.  He would like a loan to purchase animal feed and additional livestock.  He expects this investment to increase the family income by 20%.  He is pleased with the microfinance services and has kept his debt below 20% of his business equity.

loans.use: to purchase feed and livestock

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is a 58-year-old woman from Al Hussein, Amman, Jordan. Due to cultural issues, Aisha was not willing to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her son.

Aisha is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more accessories for trading purposes. Aisha is looking to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase accessories for resale.

loans.name: Safarahmad

texts.ru: Сафарахмад проживает в районе Хамадони. Ему 45 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Сафарахмад занимается посевом зерновых культур. Этим видом деятельности он занимается три года. Кредит берет для посева пшеницы.
texts.en: Safarahmad lives in the Hamadoni district.  He is 45 years old, married and has five children.  Safarahmad is involved in sowing cereal crops.  He has been in this business for three years.  He is requesting this loan to sow wheat.

loans.use: to sow wheat

loans.name: Akramjon

texts.ru: Арамджон житель города Худжанд. Ему 31 год. Он женат. У него трое детей. Акрамджон предоставляет услугу, он таксист. В этой области он уже 10 лет. Кредит берет для ремонта своего автомобиля.
texts.en: Akramjon is a resident of the city of Khujand.  He is 31 years old, married and has three children.  Akramjon provides a taxi service; he is a taxi driver.  He has been in this business for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Mohammed

texts.en:
Mohammed is a 55-year-old married man from Al Hashimi Amman, Jordan. He has nine children.

Mohammed is requesting a loan of JOD 800 to do some home maintenance with an aspiration to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To do some home maintenance

loans.name: Abdujabor

texts.ru: Абдучабор житель района Восеъ. Возраст, 32 года. Женат. Имеет четверых детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается животоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается три года. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdujabor is a resident of the Vose district.  He is 32 years old, married and has four children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Abdujabor is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for three years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase several heads of small livestock.

loans.use: to purchase several heads of small livestock

loans.name: Khatichamo

texts.ru: Хатичамо более восьми лет занимается торговлей. Она имеет торговую точку, где продает детскую и женскую одежду. У нее среднее образование. Она разведена. Ей 40 лет. Она имеет двоих детей. Кредит берет для покупки сезонного товара с целью увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Khatichamo has been involved in sales for over eight years.  She has a retail outlet, where she sells children's and women's clothing.  She has a secondary education.  Khatichamo is 40 years, divorced and has two children.  She is requesting this loan to purchase seasonal merchandise in order to expand the merchandise selection.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal merchandise

loans.name: Astrid Yusibeth

texts.es:
Astrid, vive con su esposo y su hijo de 4 años de edad, ella es comerciante dedicada a atender una joyería, este negocio tiene 7 años de existir, surgió por iniciativa de los dos junto a su esposo, ya que decidieron juntos iniciar un negocio que les fuera rentable.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de joyas de oro como cadenas, aretes, pulseras, anillos, con este préstamo espera surtir el negocio, ofrecer a los clientes nuevos estilos para generar más ventas. 
Astrid espera que su negocio prospere, ya que al invertirle espera que su condición mejore llamado la atención de más personas que le adquieran joyas.
texts.en:
Astrid lives with her husband and her 4-year-old son.  She runs a jewelry store.  She has owned her business for 7 years.  The business came about through the joint initiative of herself and her husband.  They decided to start a business which would be profitable for them.

Astrid is requesting a loan to buy gold jewelry such as chains, earrings, bracelets and rings.  She hopes to use this loan to stock her business and offer her customers new styles so that she can generate more sales.

Astrid hopes that her business will thrive.  She hopes that this investment will improve her business and attract more people who will buy her jewelry.

loans.use: to buy gold jewelry (chains, earrings, bracelets and rings)

loans.name: Riziki

texts.en:
Riziki is a 31-yer-old, married man with three children. Two of his children attend school while the other is still too young for school. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family.

Riziki has operated a vegetable grocery business for the past two years. He explains that his clients are mostly local area villagers. He faces a major challenge of seasonality; in other words, there is low harvesting during the dry seasons. He dreams of expanding his business.

With the proceeds of the loan in the amount of 20,000 KES he is requesting he would like to purchase one crate of tomatoes and five sacks of potatoes for resale purposes. He decided to join Yehu to access funds to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to expand his business by purchasing additional vegetables (tomatoes and potatoes) for resale.

loans.name: Rola

texts.en:
Rola is a 30-year-old married woman from Aqaba, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Rola has a home-based project through which she sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase more clothes.

Rola is looking to improve her business so that she can increase her customer base and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase clothes for resale.

loans.name: Hodikhoja

texts.ru: Ходихоча житель района Бохтар. Он женат. Ему 49 лет. У него четверо детей. Его старший сын находится в Российской Федерации. Сам он занимается животноводством. Он в основном разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Hodikhoja is a resident of the Bohtar district.  He is 49 years old, married and has four children.  His oldest son is in the Russian Federation.  Hodikhoja is involved in animal husbandry.  He primarily breeds cattle at home.  He is requesting this loan to purchase several heads of cattle.

loans.use: to buy several heads of cattle

loans.name: Angel Daniel

texts.es:
Ángel, vive en casa familiar junto a sus padres, tiene 31 años de edad, el tiene su negocio de productos de la canasta básica y un ciber el cual atiende de lunes a domingo de 8:00am a 7:00pm.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar mercadería para la tienda y comprar mercadería como: gaseosas, jugos, gatorade, galletas, dulces, chocolates, teniendo variedad podrá siempre mantener estable su negocio y lograr que sus ganancias sean mejores cada día.
El objetivo de Ángel es brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a sus padres y tener lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
Ángel lives with his parents in the family home. He is 31 years old. He has a business where he sells basic household products and provides internet service, which he tends from Monday through Sunday, from 8 am to 7 pm.

He will use the loan to buy merchandise for the store, such as soft drinks, juices, gatorade, crackers, sweets,  and chocolates. By having a variety of products, he will always be able to maintain a stable business and succeed in having better earnings every day.

Ángel's goal is to offer a better quality of life to his parents and to have the necessities to live.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juices, gatorade, crackers, sweets, and chocolates.

loans.name: Jose Mariano

texts.es:
José, vive en casa propia, con su esposa y dos hijas de 13 y 9 años de edad, él se dedica a la agricultura y tambien es sastre, tiene 10 años en la agricultura, lo aprendió de su padre, trabaja en lo propio, esta actividad le agrada, además de que obtiene el Maíz que es necesario para la alimentación de su familia. 
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla, abono y herbicidas, para cultivar los terrenos, con este préstamo obtendrá los recursos necesarios para ejecutar su trabajo agrícola y con la esperanza de que sea bueno sus frutos.
La aspiración de José es que su familia pueda tener lo necesario para la alimentación, que él tenga éxito con las cosechas y poder ser buen cliente con este préstamo.
texts.en:
José lives in his own house with his wife and two daughters who are 13 and 9 years old.  He’s a farmer and also a tailor. He’s been farming for 10 years having learned from his father.  He works in what’s his and he likes the activity; he mentions also that he obtains corn needed to feed his family.

He’s asking for a loan to buy seeds, manure and herbicide to farm his land.  With this loan he’ll have the resources necessary to do his agricultural work hoping his harvest will be good.

José’s wish is that his family will have everything necessary for their nutrition and that his crops will be successful and also to be a good client with respect to the loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Omari

texts.en:
Omari is a 35-year-old married man with four children, three of whom attend school while the other one is still too young for school. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family.

Omari has operated a motorbike transportation business for the past two years. His potential clients are the local area villagers. He faces a major challenge of the rising cost of fuel. He dreams of buying another motorbike in the future.

With the 50,000 KES, he wants to purchase a new motorbike for his business. He decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike for his business.

loans.name: Giovanny Alfonso

texts.es: Giovanny trabaja en su legumbrería desde hace aproximadamente 2 años, cuando un familiar se lo vendió y el le realizó algunas mejoras y lo surtió de legumbre completamente. Giovanny siempre se ha preocupado por brindarles a su esposa y su hijo todo lo necesario y mejorarles la calidad de vida, por eso cuando le surgió la posibilidad de comprarle el negocio de la legumbrería a su familia lo hizo con el fin de que este le generara los ingresos necesarios para poder lograr su cometido. Giovanny desde entonces ha procurado porque su negocio crezca, se expanda y se consolide en su sector, y es por esto que constantemente le realiza mejoras e incrementa la cantidad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Giovanny tiene un gran sueño y es el de poder brindarle a su hijo la mejor educación posible, por lo que siempre quiere que su negocio le genere más ingresos para poder conseguir lo necesario para el estudio de su hijo. Con el ánimo de que sus ventas aumenten, Giovanny busca hacerle algunas mejoras locativas a su negocio y de incrementarle la cantidad de productos que ofrece actualmente a sus clientes. Sin embargo, debido a la temporada de invierno que se ha vivido en los últimos meses, Giovanny no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar estas mejoras, por lo que espera que un préstamo le permita acceder a realizar las mejoras locativas a su negocio y a comprar más productos que permitan aumentar los productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Giovanny aspira que con estas mejoras a su negocio, y con el incremento en la cantidad de productos que ofrece, sus ventas aumenten considerablemente y así pueda generar el capital suficiente para ofrecerle a su hijo la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Giovanny has worked in a vegetable shop for about 2 years since a relative sold it to him and he did some improvements and completely stocked it with vegetables.  Giovanny has always been concerned about providing his wife and son everything necessary and to improve their quality of life.  Because of this, when the possibility to buy the vegetable shop from a relative arose he did so with the goal of generating the necessary income to reach his objective.

Since then, Giovanny has striven to make his business grow, expand and consolidate itself in its sector and this is why he’s constantly doing improvements and increasing the amount of products he has in stock.  Giovanny has a great dream which is to be able to provide his son with the best possible education. 

With the hope that his sales will increase, Giovanny is looking to do some improvements to the locale and to increase the amount of products he currently offers his customers.  However, because of the winter season lived these past three months, Giovanny does not have sufficient capital to do these improvements so is hoping that a loan will allow him to do the improvements and to buy more products to increase what he has available for his customers.  Giovanny hopes that with the improvements to the locale and with the increase in products on offer his sales will increase considerably so that he can generate sufficient capital to provide his son with the best possible education.

loans.use: to do some improvements to his locale and increase the selection of products in stock.

loans.name: Adiba

texts.ru: Адиба жительница Яванского района. Ей 31 год. Она уже четыре года как занимается торговлей. Адиба открыла магазин, где продает детские игрушки, кроватки и колыбельки. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж помогает ей в бизнесе. Она берет кредит для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Adiba lives in the Yavan region. She is 31 years old. For four years, she has been a merchant. She opened a store which sells children's toys, beds and cribs. She is married and has three children. Her husband helps her in the store. She is requesting a loan to expand her merchandise.

loans.use: Buy stuffed animals and strollers.

loans.name: Karomatkhon

texts.ru: Кароматхон жительница города Кургантюбе. Ей 43 года. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж уехал на заработки в Россию. Сама Кароматхон занимается торговлей на рынке. Она в основном продает растительное и хлопковое масло. Этим видом бизнеса она занимается восемь лет. Кредит берет для покупки растительного масла.
texts.en: Karomatkhon is a resident of the city of Qurgan-Tube.  She is 43 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband left to work in Russia.  Karomatkhon is involved in sales at a market.  She primarily sells vegetable and cottonseed oil.  She has been involved in this business for eight years.  She is requesting this loan to purchase vegetable oil.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable oil

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 36-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and only child. He is the main source of income for his family. He also cooperates with his wife who works as a teacher in a local school. He started his own business as an electrician since 2003. His work consists of setting and installing home electricity. He works upon request on a free-lance basis and has his own shop. Today, he asks for a loan of $1,600 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to replace and buy additional electricity tools. He feels that this will definitely boost his work and thus his profits. In the future, he plans to join a local company where he can benefit from their experience.

loans.use: to replace and buy additional electrical tools

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru: Хафиза замужем и любящая мать. У нее один ребенок. Её свекровь живет с ними. Последние пять лет она занимается купле- продажей женской одежды. Так как она привозит высококачественный товар, клиенты доверяют ей и заказывают нужный товар. У нее круг своих  постоянных клиентов. Хафиза хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хороший доход и улучшить благосостояние семьи. С этой целью она запрашивает займ для покупки нового ассортимента одежды.
texts.en: Hafiza is married and is a loving mother.  She has one child.  Her father-in-law lives with them.  Hafiza has been involved in buying and selling women's clothing for the last five years.  Because she brings in high-quality merchandise, her customers trust her and order necessary merchandise from her.  She has a circle of regular customers.  Hafiza wants to expand her business in order to earn a good income and improve her family's welfare.  In order to achieve this goal, she is requesting a loan to purchase a new selection of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in order to expand merchandise selection

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухроб женат и любящий отец двоих детей. Он молодой, активный и умный человек. Для содержания своих детей и жены он начал заниматься купле- продажей кормов для скота и откормом скота. Имеет торговую точку на центральном рынке города. В обороте имеет 3 голов крупного рогатого скота. Закупает товар 4 раза в месяц у фермеров сельских местностей. Сухроб хотел бы получить займ в размере 2000$ США для покупки корма для скота с целью увлечения товарооборота.
texts.en: Suhrob is married and a loving father of two children. He is a young, active and intelligent man. He began buying and selling fodder for livestock and animal fattening so he can take care of his wife and children. He has a store in the central market in town. He has three heads of cattle in stock. He buys the fodder four times a month from farmers in rural areas. Suhrob would like to take out a loan in the amount of USD$2,000 to purchase fodder for livestock with the purpose of increasing the circulation of goods.

loans.use: to buy fodder for cattle for resale.

loans.name: Nabi

texts.ru: Наби 48 - летний женатый мужчина. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он имеет средне - специальное образование. Он сварщик по специальности. В этой области работает два года. Кредит просит для приобретения необходимых инструментов.
texts.en: Nabi is a 48 year old married man. He has two children. His wife is a homemaker. He has secondary education with specialization in welding. He has been working in this filed for two years. Nabi is asking for a loan to buy the necessary tools.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary tools.

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor De Maria es una emprendedora que su negocio a la que se dedica es a la venta de mercadería en general en el cual ha ella se le brindo un financiamiento para que invirtiera en el negocio en la compra de mercadería en general, ella nos expresa que con el crédito aumento su inventario y sus clientes de igual manera. Actualmente Flor está solicitando crédito para comprar pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, cosméticos que  también sus clientes le solicitan.
texts.en: Flor De Maria is an entrepreneur with a retail business. She received a previous loan that helped her stock up her business, thus increasing her customer base, too. She is currently asking for this loan for purchasing pants, shirts, skirts, and dresses, in order to fulfill some orders placed by her customers.

loans.use: to purchase pants, shirts, skits, dresses and cosmetics

loans.name: Salim

texts.ru: Салим женат и имеет одного сына. Жена является предпринимателем. Более 10 лет он занимается откормом мелкого рогатого скота и предоставляет услуги строителя. Сын помогает по бизнесу. Салим хочет улучшить свое жилищные условия семьи и с этой целью запрашивает займ для ремонта своего дома, то есть для покупки пиломатериалов и шифера. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Salim is married and has one son.  His wife is an entrepreneur.  Salim has been involved in fattening up small livestock and providing construction services for over ten years.  His son helps him with the business.  Salim wants to improve his family's living conditions and, with this goal in mind, is requesting this loan to repair his house, i.e. to purchase timber and slates.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase timber and slates

loans.name: Iftikhor

texts.ru: Ифтихор проживает в городе Истаравшан. Возраст, 41 год. Женат. Имеет троих детей. Жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается выращиванием овощей для торговли. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа топлива для трактора.
texts.en: Iftikhor lives in the city of Istaravshan.  He is 41 years old, married and has three children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Iftikhor is involved in growing vegetables for sale.  He has been in this business for four years.  He is requesting this loan to purchase fuel for a tractor.

loans.use: to purchase fuel

loans.name: Zuhra

texts.ru: Зухра замужем. Она трудолюбивая и умная женщина. Более 5 лет она занимается купле- продажей мужской одежды на рынке «Саховат». Она имеет хороший опыт в сфере торговли и имеет постоянных клиентов. Продает высококачественные товары, она конкурентоспособна. Зухра хочет расширить бизнес и пополнить   ассортимент товаров. С этой целью Зухра запрашивает займ в размере 14000 Сомони.
texts.en: Zuhra is married.  She is a hardworking and smart woman.  She has been involved in buying and selling men's clothing at the "Sahovat" market for over five years.  Zuhra has a good experience in the sales field and has regular customers.  She sells high-quality goods and is competitive.  Zuhra wants to expand her business and add to her merchandise selection.  To achieve this goal, Zuhra is requesting a loan in the sum of 1400 Somoni.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер разведен и имеет двух детей. Он сам воспитывает и обеспечивает своих детей и старается улучшить благосостояние семьи. Более 5 лет он занимается предоставлением услуг по  перевозке грузов. Алишер хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки грузовой автомашины «Форланд». Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Alisher is divorced and has two children.  He raises and provides for his children himself and tries to improve his family's welfare.  He has been involved in providing transportation services for over five years.  Alisher wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $3000 to purchase a "Fortland" truck.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy a new truck

loans.name: Sadi

texts.ru: Саъди женат и имеет одну дочку. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более двух лет занимается предоставлением услуг такси в своем городе. Он хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия  и обеспечить свою семью всем. Саъди хотел бы получить займ для покупки еще одного автомобиля с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Sadi is married and has one daughter.  His wife is involved in household work.  Sadi has been involved in providing taxi services in his city.  He wants to improve his living conditions and provide everything for his family.  Sadi wants to obtain a loan to purchase one more car in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy car in order to expand his business

loans.name: Rajaa

texts.en:
Rajaa is a 35-year-old married woman. Because Rajaa is a conservative person, she asked her husband to be in the photo instead of her. Her husband Emad is a doctor who works after his shift at home selling watches for all ages.

Rajaa sometimes helps in selling those watches, but she wants to do more so she has applied for a loan to buy more watches and one day open a store for selling watches.

loans.use: to buy more watches for resale.

loans.name: Abdulhameed

texts.en:
Abdulhameed is 38 years old, a married man, who has 2 children. 

Three months ago, he opened a small restaurant for selling sandwiches and some traditional foods like hummus (chickpea paste), fool (broad beans) and others.

Now Abdulhameed has applied for a loan to start making more sandwiches to bring in more customers to his shop.

loans.use: to start making more sandwiches.

loans.name: Abdulhoshim

texts.ru: Абдулхошим женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более двух лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродукции. Он начал свой бизнес с выращивания лука. Абдулхошим хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплаты труда работников. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Abdulhoshim is married and is raising three minor children. His wife is a homemaker.  For over two years he has been growing farm produce. He began his business by growing onions. Abdulhoshim would like to receive a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and cover the cost of manual labor. He hopes for your help and compassion.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Rustam

texts.ru: Рустам женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. А Рустам более 20 лет занимается выращиванием и реализацией риса. В бизнесе помогают ему семья. У него очень богатый опыт в этой сфере бизнеса. Рустам также занимается скотоводством. Рустам хотел бы получить займ для покупки селитры, ГСМ и оплаты аренды земли. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Rustam is married and is a responsible father of two children.  His wife works at a dekhan farm.  And Rustam has been involved in growing and selling rice for over 20 years.  His family helps him with the business.  He has a very rich experience in this business field.  Rustam is also involved in animal husbandry.  Rustam wants to obtain a loan to purchase fertilizers, fuel and to pay for land lease.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Roland

texts.ru:
В этом году Роладн планирует жениться. Он хочет заранее улучшить бытовые условия в своей квартире и преобрести стиральную машинку и холодильник. В связи с этим просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 8,000 гривен.
Предыдущий кредит он использовал для покупки компьютера и компьютерного стола.

Родан по прежнему работает в небольшой компании, которая продает макаронные и хлебные издения.
texts.en: Roland plans to get married this year.  He wants to improve his household conditions in his apartment in advance and purchase a washing machine and a refrigerator.  Due to this, he is requesting a loan in the sum of 8,000 hryvnia.  He used his previous loan to purchase a computer and a computer desk.  Roland continues to work at a small pasta- and bread-making company.

loans.use: to purchase household appliances for his family

loans.name: Jessica Isabel

texts.es:
Jessica de 32 años, es una mujer trabajadora comenzó vendiendo cosméticos para ayudar con los gastos de la casa.

Ahora tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de cosméticos en la parte delantera de su casa. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar el inventario que tienen en su mercadería para tener más variedad. Con el préstamo quiere comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos etc.
texts.en:
Jessica, who is 32 years old, is a hardworking woman.  She began selling cosmetics to help with the household costs.

Now she has a small business where she sells cosmetics in the front of her house.  She has high hopes for her business.  This is why she wants to improve the inventory in her merchandise to have a greater variety.  With the loan, she will buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, etc.

loans.use: buy perfumes, creams, and cosmetics

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es:
Miguel, vive con su esposa, sus padres, no tienen hijos, él se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, este negocio surgió por iniciativa propia, trabaja en su casa, no hay un horario fijo para trabajar y ya tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad.  
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de sacos de semilla de marañón cruda, para procesarla, empacarla y ponerla a la venta, esto le permitirá tener la disponibilidad de producto para continuar trabajando. 
La aspiración de Miguel es que su negocio sea cada vez mejor, más grande, que su familia se encuentre bien y en un futuro ser papá.
texts.en:
Miguel lives with his wife and his parents.  They do not have children.  He sells cashews.  This business came out of his own initiative.  He works in his house.  He does not have a fixed schedule, and he already has much experience in this activity.
He is currently asking for a loan to buy sacks of raw cashews, to process them, package them, and sell them.  This will allow him to have the product available to continue working.
Miguel's ambition is that his business will constantly become better and bigger.  He wants his family to be well and to be a father in the future.

loans.use: buy sacks of raw cashews.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 31 year old business man.  He sells clothes to earn a living.  He also does farming to supplement his income. David has a five year old child who goes to school.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has improved his business and has employed one person. He thanks Faulu Kenya for training him on good business management.

David desires to open other outlets of his business in the future. He needs a loan of KES 62,000 to buy clothes.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Hachem

texts.en: Hachem is a 21-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. Regardless of his young age, Hachem is doing the best he can to earn money and have his own family and children. For this reason, he decided to have his own business, so he opened his own poultry shop in 2008. He’s a respectable person known for his good place and delicious food. Today, he’s asking to borrow $2100 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase an additional freezer for his shop, to be able to keep the food in good condition. In that way, he will gain people‘s trust and therefore attract more customers. In the future, he plans to open a snack shop just nearby his poultry business.

loans.use: to purchase an additional freezer for his shop

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
This is 36 year-old Anthony. He is married to a businesswoman and has one child aged 17 years. In 2006, Anthony established his drinks, milk, ovaltine, liquor, sugar, butter, baby cream, and soap business. He began his business because his parents were business people and he grew up in the business even though he was going to school. But he paid more attention to the business and after he left school, he decided to continue with it. Working 12 hours a day, 7 days a week, he earns about Le 1,500,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 5,000,000. Anthony requires a loan in order to purchase phones - 20 pieces @ Le200,000, savanna* drinks - 5 crates @ le120,000 and maltina** drinks - 4 crates @ Le100,000.  He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 750,000. In the future, Anthony plans to become an international businessman.  The business is good as it helps in adding to his capital. He hope to educate his child as he will make more profit out of it.  He usually experiences challenges due to the change in the exchange rate.  He doesn’t have competition as his shop is the only cosmetic and provision shop in the area. He serves students from the nearby college and people around town.  He serves about 40 people a day.  He treats his customers well.  He is assisted by his wife, and usually buys his goods from Conakry, Guinea twice every month by public transport.  Anthony saves some of his profit and the rest he uses to buy more stock.  He is planning to expand his business by accessing more loans.  He thanks you for your support.

*cider
**energizing drink made of malt and hops

loans.use: to purchase phones, savanna drinks and maltina drinks

loans.name: Yusifu

texts.en:
Yusifu is 45 years old and married with 4 children between, ages of 3 years and 28 years. He runs a general merchandise store in Goderich western area in Freetown Sierra Leone. He has 3 children that are currently attending school.

He's been in this business for 6 years and sells rice, oil, sardine, cigarettes, bundle water, paste and cement at his store. He also earns income from small-scale farming at oogo farm. He says that the main challenge to his business is insufficient capital to invest in the business.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to buy more rice, oil, sardine, cigarette, bundle water, paste and cement. He says that the extra income from this loan will help him support his children's education. In the future, he would like to open more outlets in another area in Freetown. He is grateful for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more bags of rice, cement, bundle water and cooking oil.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 36 years old, married, with two children in school.  To earn a living, he runs a retail shop.  He has been in the business for four years.  He works hard in his business so as to provide for his family. Through Faulu Kenya, he has acquired knowledge of business management, which has helped him to improve his business.

Stephen hopes to grow his business in five years.  He needs a loan of 70,000 KES to buy sugar, cooking fat, maize flour and tea leaves.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking fat, maize flour and tea leaves.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru: Дилшод более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. Он в основном разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Ему 23 года. Он разведен. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и коровы.
texts.en: Dilshod has been in cattle business for over five years. Primarily he breeds cattle for resale.  He is 23 years old. He is divorced. He is taking out a loan to purchase calves and a cow.

loans.use: to purchase calves and a cow.

loans.name: Sandro Javier

texts.es:
El señor Sandro es un hombre que quiere mejorar constantemente para poder ofrecerle lo mejor a su esposa y a su pequeño de  8 años, este señor es un microempresario, él tiene un taxi y brinda su servicio diariamente, cada día conoce nuevos clientes y los atiende siempre muy cortésmente con la finalidad de que tengan una buena impresión y sobre todo se sientan seguros dentro del vehículo.

Fue su primo quien lo animó para que incursionara en este tipo  de negocio, él sabía que podría resultarle rentable, con el tiempo y el esfuerzo dedicado Sandro disfruta ahora de los beneficios de trabajar independientemente.

Actualmente el desea poder convertir su auto, es decir el carro que tiene trabaja a base de gasolina pero él quiere que ahora trabaje a base de gas, el mismo que resulta mucho más barato en el mercado automotor. El es consciente que con esta nueva cantidad de dinero que pueda ahorra podrá continuar luchando por tener un auto nuevo y brindar un rápido y mejor servicio, esto también ayudará a que empiece ya a construir su gran sueño “Tener una compañía de taxis”.
texts.en:
Sandro is a man that constantly wants to improve so that he can offer the best to his wife and his 8 year old son.  This man is a micro-businessman.  He has a taxi, and he offers his service daily.  Each day he meets new customers.  He always assists them courteously with the aim that they have a good impression of him, and above all else that they feel safe in his vehicle.

It was his cousin who encouraged him to jump into this type of business.  He know that it would end up being profitable.  With the time and the effort that he has dedicated, Sandro now enjoys the benefits of working independently.

He currently wants to be able to convert his auto.  That is to say that the car that he has runs on gasoline, but he now wants it to run on gas.  This will make it much cheaper in the motor market.  He realizes that with this new amount of money.  He will be able to save, and he will be able to continue fighting to have a new auto, and offer a fast and better service.  This, also, will help him to begin to reach his great dream of "having a taxi company".

loans.use: convert his car from gasoline to gas.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр житель города Турсунзаде. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Бахтиёр имеет среднее образование. На сегодняшний день он занимается торговлей заколок и порошков по уничтожению насекомых. Этим видом деятельности он занимается 10 лет. Кредит берет для покупки канцелярских товаров.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor lives in the town of Tursun-zode. He is 27 years old. He is married and has 2 children. Bakhtiyor has a high school education. Currently he is in business of selling hairpins and insecticide powders. He has been in this business for 10 years.  He is taking out a loan to purchase office supplies.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies.

loans.name: Nuevo Porvenir 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Damaris is the coordinator of her group Nuevo Porvenir (New future) 1, 2 & 3. This group is composed of 15 entrepreneurs (women and men) located in the city of San Pedro de Macoris. Their community is a rural area surrounded by fields of sugarcane. She works selling miscellaneous products such as silver jewelry, clothes and shoes. She will use her loan to purchase jewelry such as bracelets, rings, earrings, and some pairs of shoes for women and men. 

Damaris is a mother of three children and they still live together with their father (her long-term partner). Her most important challenge is to ensure that her children have a good future. She will make it possible by working hard. Damaris is receiving her fifth loan from Esperanza Internacional and, because her loan repayments have all been made punctually, she has been able to grow her business with the re-investment she makes from each loan. She started her business three years ago and at that time only sold clothes. By taking loans, she started to introduce different products. She would like to save her profits so that she can pay for her children's university education and be able to provide them with a safe home as she also has plans to improve her house.

In this loan, we are adding three pictures. They were taken in their community. The three pictures complete the group of 15 members.

loans.use: to buy rings, bracelets, necklaces, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Marta Ligia Alviar Toro

texts.es: La señora Marta se dedica desde hace 25 años a la venta de ropa a familiares, amigos y conocidos, este negocio surgió gracias al gusto de la señora Marta por el comercio, la moda y las ventas. Actualmente, la señora Marta trabaja sola y con su personalidad amable y alegre ha podido conseguir muchos clientes. Con el ánimo de seguir con su negocio, verlo crecer y cumplir con pedidos que tiene, la señora Marta requiere de la compra de ropa para dama y caballero que le permita cumplir con sus sueños y obligaciones familiares. A futuro, la señora Marta desea tener su propio almacén y apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
For the past 25 years, Marta has sold clothes to friends, family, and acquaintances. This business came about because Marta enjoys business, fashion, and sales. Marta currently works alone. With her friendly personality and cheerfulness, has been able to bring in many clients. 

To advance her business, see it grow, and meet the clients’ requests, Marta must buy clothing for men and women, allowing her to fulfill her dreams and family responsibilities. In the future, Marta hopes to have her own store and support her family.

loans.use: purchase clothing for men and women

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en:
Joshua is a 22-year-old single businessman. He has been operating a motorcycle transport business for the past five years with a monthly income of KES 25,000, which he uses to cater for his basic needs.

He is applying for his third loan with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. Joshua will use the loan to buy a motorbike. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will service the motorbike. His hopes and dreams are to save and continue with his education.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Amir

texts.en:
Amir owns a great little store on one of the busy streets of his city. He is a married Iraqi man and a father of four children.

Since 2009, he has been selling clothing and small furniture items for babies, toddlers and small children, making it easy for families in town to buy what their children need from birth to kindergarten. At first, he was making sure his store carried everything families would need to buy. Now he would like to make sure his customers have a better and easier shopping experience.

Amir is requesting a loan of $2700 from Relief International - Iraq to redesign his store, making his products more accessible to his customers. Amir knows his store currently looks more like a warehouse and is not as friendly as he would like it to be. He would like to make sure his customers can have a better shopping experience and easier access to his products.

loans.use: to redesign his store to make his products more accessible to his customers.

loans.name: Yatim

texts.ru: Ятим более пяти лет занимается растениеводством. В основном он занимается посевом зерновых культур. Ему 55 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он берет кредит для закупа семян, минеральных удобрений и топлива.
texts.en: Yatim has been engaged in crop growing for over five years. He mostly grows grains. Yatim is 55 years old, married, and has four children. He is taking out a loan to purchase seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel.

loans.use: to sow wheat.

loans.name: Julia Epifania

texts.es:
Julia es una mujer trabajadora que comenzó hace años atrás un negocio de venta de ropa con su hija. Poco a poco  fue creciendo en sus ventas hasta que su hija se fue al exterior y le comenzó a enviar ropa para que Julia la vendiera a un precio cómodo para los clientes. 

Poco a poco  creció en las ventas. Tiene clientas fijas que le hacen pedidos de pantalones, blusas etc. Con el dinero que gana le ayuda a mantenerse financieramente ya que ahora todos sus hijos tienen sus propias familias.  

Ella quiere mejorar su ingresos por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar telas, blusas, pantalones y así tener más ingresos para asegurar su vejez.
texts.en:
Julia is a hard-working woman who years ago started a clothes store with her daughter. Her turnover increased gradually, until her daughter worked outside of the store and began sending clothes to her mother who could sell them at an affordable price for their customers. The sales continued to improve. Julia has regular customers who place orders for trousers, blouses and so on. She spends her profit on personal needs, because all her children now have their own family.

Julia wants to increase her income, which is why she applies for this loan to buy fabrics, blouses and trousers, and in this way she will have more money to keep for her old age.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, blouses and trousers.

loans.name: Kapeneta

texts.en:
Kapeneta is fifty-two years of age and is married with four children. She owns & operates a business venture, selling fried foods in the local community.  She has 2 years of experience in this business. Kapeneta needs a loan of WST 1,500 to purchase raw ingredients such as chicken, sausages and flour to produce products for sale.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $146 per week) to improve the business.

In 2010, Kapeneta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Kapeneta's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients such as chicken, sausages and flour to produce products for sale.

loans.name: Faanati

texts.en:
Fanati is forty years of age and is married with five children. She owns & operates a business venture, selling fried foods in the local community.  She has 2 years of experience in this business.    Faanati needs a loan of WST 1,500 to purchase new items to expand her product offerings.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 450 talas or US $188 per week) to expand the business.

In 2011, Faanati joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Faanati's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offerings.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz de 29 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda.
Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora ella trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres variados. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como enlatados, dulces, granos, bebidas, legumbres etc.
texts.en:
Luz, 29, is a hard working woman who hopes to grow her small store in the next few years. She first started selling small things and little by little started to earn an income. She now works in her store selling various groceries. She has many ambitions, which is why she wants to continue with her store. 

She will use the loan to buy groceries for her store, such as canned goods, sweets, grains, beverages, legumes, etc.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, sweets, grains, beverages, and legumes.

loans.name: Martha Doris

texts.es: la señora Martha tiene como principal actividad la venta de regalos los fines de semana y esta empezando una  segunda actividad en la venta de embutidos y carne  en uno de los mercados mas concurridos de la ciudad de La Paz,  con el préstamo tiene pensado el poder ampliar su segunda actividad con la compra de mas embutidos en diferentes variedades de cerdo, res y pollo, como ella  se constituye en jefe de hogar ya que se encuentra a cargo de sus dos hijas menores y con este negocio tiene pensado poder mejorar sus ingresos ya que es su única actividad que le ayuda a mantenerse y correr con los gastos de educación de sus hijas y con el tiempo desea  comprar el puesto de venta que le pertenece a su hermana y el mismo se encuentra como prestado, con las dos actividades mejoraran sus ingresos y su calidad de vida para tener un futuro mejor
texts.en: Martha's main activity is selling gifts on weekends. She is starting a new activity selling sausages and meats in one of the busiest markets in the city of La Paz. With the loan, she is planning on being able to expand her second activity, buying more, different types of sausages made of pork, beef and chicken. She is the head of household, raising her younger daughters, and with this business she is planning on improving her income. This is her only activity ant helps her to support herself and cover her daughters' education expenses. Over time, she wants to buy the sales stall, which belongs to her sister and which she is borrowing. With both activities, her income will improve as well as her quality of life and she will have a better future.

loans.use: to increase capital to buy sausages.

loans.name: Odbayar

texts.en: Odbayar's car has become old and too damaged to use for taxi service. Therefore, he has decided to make some repairs and improvements to his car again. They will be very important in order to sustain his business. The requested loan will be used to purchase some of the necessary spare parts for renovating his taxi car.

loans.use: to purchase necessary spare parts to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is 56 years old and lives in Locsoon, Tudela. She is married with one child. 

Juana has a clothing business, earning approximately PHP 3000 each month by doing this type of work. Juana has requested a loan of PHP 30,000 to purchase additional clothing materials.

Juana has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothing materials.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is thirty years of age and is married with two children.

Naomi  owns & operates a business venture, selling a variety of different products in the local community.  She has 4 years of experience in this business.    Naomi  needs a loan of WST $2,450 to purchase additional products such as sugar, flour, salt, and snacks to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 800 talas or US $333 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Naomi  joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Naomi 's 4th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods such as flour, sugar, salt, and snacks to sell.

loans.name: Santa Sagrario

texts.es:
Santa Sagrario, tiene 50 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos de 12, 17 y 22 años, dos de ellos estudian, vive en aldea la Rosa, en Yoro. Su esposo es mecánico automotriz.
Doña Santa, anteriormente se dedicaba a realizar trabajos de costura y por necesidad de obtener más ingresos decidió comprar mercadería y vender. Tiene diez años de vender mercadería de todo tipo como ser sandalias para adultos y niños, blusas y ropa interior. Tiene abierto su negocio las 8 horas del día. 
Esta solicitando este prestamos de L.10,000.00 para comprar sandalias, ropa interior, cosméticos y plásticos. Con el cual tendrá surtido el negocio para aumentar las ventas y sus ganancias de donde podrá darles el estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Santa Sagrario, age 50, is married and has three children, ages 12, 17, and 22.  Two of them go to school.  She lives in the La Rosa village in Yoro.  Her husband is an auto mechanic.  

Santa used to devote herself to sewing jobs.  Out of the necessity to get more income, she decided to buy merchandise to sell.  For ten years she has been selling all types of merchandise like children’s and adult’s sandals, blouses and underwear.  Her business is open eight hours a day.

She is requesting this loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy sandals, underwear, cosmetics, and plastics.  She will then have stocked her business in order to increase sales.  This will increase her income so that she will be able to pay for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy sandals, underwear, cosmetics, and plastics.

loans.name: Melba Esperanza

texts.es:
Melba de 26 años, es una mujer trabajadora comenzó vendiendo artículos de papelería para ayudar con los gastos de la casa.

Ahora tiene un pequeño negocio en la parte delantera de su casa. Vendiendo papelería y artículos para el hogar desde las 07h00 hasta las 20h00. Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere mejorar el inventario que tienen en la papelería. Con el préstamo quiere comprar vitrinas, cuadernos, plumas etc.  

En el futuro quiere tener una papelería grande para generar mayores ingresos y darles a sus dos hijos la economía que necesitan.
texts.en:
Melba is 26 years old. She is a hard-working woman who started selling paper goods to help with the household expenses.

Now she has a small shop in the front part of her home. She sells paper goods and household items from 7 a.m to 8 p.m. She has great aspirations for her business, and for this reason she wants to increase the inventory she has in her paper goods shop. With the loan, she wants to buy display cases, notebooks, pens, etc. 

In the future, she wants to have a large paper goods store, to generate more income and give her two children the economic foundation they need.

loans.use: to buy display cases, notebooks, pens and other items.

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel was born in 1964 in Acharkut village, Tavush area. Samvel lives with his mother, wife, and 3 children: two sons and a daughter. Samvel’s mother is a pensioner, his wife is a housewife, his elder son is serving in Armenian Army, and his younger children attend school.

For a long time Samvel has been engaged in agriculture and a vehicle repair business. Samvel rents a workshop, where he repairs cars in the morning. He spends the rest of his day breeding piglets, keeping bees, and growing fruits and vegetables. Samvel says that his primary activity is beekeeping. 
Samvel and his family sell their agricultural produce from their house. Thanks to his agricultural business, Samvel is able to meet most of his family’s needs. 

This is Samvel’s second loan from Nor Horizon, and he is currently asking for a loan of 1,000,000 AMD to buy two sows and fodder for his pigs.

loans.use: to buy two sows and fodder for his pigs.

loans.name: Galina

texts.ru:
Галина с мужем и двумя детьми живет в селе Горинчево, Хустский район. Она занимается лозоплетением, изготавливает разные хлебницы, веночки, вазы для цветов и корзинки, а также много других рукодельных вещей.
