Lerma has a retail business and earns approximately PHP 15,000 each month doing this type of business.  She has a requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase equipments for the renovation of her house.

Lerma has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.  In the future, Lerma hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase equipments for the renovation of her house

loans.name: Jorge William

texts.es: El señor Jorge William tiene una papelería desde hace siete años en la cual vende además recargas a celular y saca fotocopias, este negocio le ha facilitado los medios para sacar adelante a su esposa y tres hijos. Con el ánimo de conseguir un aumento en sus ventas que últimamente han decrecido debido a la competencia en el sector, el señor Jorge William necesita de la compra de surtido en útiles escolares con los cuales pueda tener una mayor clientela, pueda sacar su negocio adelante y brindar a sus tres hijos una buena educación, vivienda y alimentación.
texts.en:
Jorge William has had a stationery shop for 7 years where he makes sales, and also he sells cell phone recharges and takes photocopies. 

This business has provided the means to support his wife and 3 children. 

In the effort of expanding his sales which recently have been subsiding due to the competition in the area, Jorge William needs to buy school supplies which which he can have better customers, can move his business ahead and give his 3 children a good education, housing and food.

loans.use: to buy school supplies

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 28 years old and married to Salome. They have one child.

He has been in the business of running a barber shop for the last ten years, from which he earns a monthly income of KES 10,000. He is applying for his first loan of KES 50,000. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer. 

He hopes to use the loan to buy shaving machines. He plans to open up another barber shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy shaving machines for the barber shop.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
El Sr. Roberto vive en su casa propia de la ciudad de Encarnación,  está casado con 3 hijos.
El se dedica a la compra-venta de productos de todo tipo, lleva a la ciudad de Posadas, Argentina por pedido, hace 10 años que se dedica a este rubro y tiene una buena clientela formada.  Es una persona muy trabajadora y sacrificada, que diariamente se esfuerza por poder darle lo mejor a su familia.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, fideos, arroz, aceites y demás artículos para la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad de progreso que Kiva y fundación les da.
texts.en:
Roberto lives in his own house in the city of Encarnación.  He is married and has three children.  He devotes himself to buying and selling all types of products.  He takes them to the city of Posadas, Argentina by order.  He has been in this trade for ten years, and he has a good customer base.  He is a very hard-working and self-sacrificing person who puts forth great effort every day in order to be able to give the best to his family.

He is requesting the loan to buy sugar, noodles, rice, oil, and other items to sell.  He is grateful for the opportunity to make progress that Kiva and the Fundación are giving him.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, rice, oil, and other items.

loans.name: Domiciana

texts.es:
La Sra. Domiciana tiene 49 años de edad, está casada con el Sr. Milciades hace 35 años, tienen 3 hijos juntos: Milciades, César y Richar, viven en su casa propia de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo.
La Sra. Domiciana es una mujer luchadora, se quedó sola porque sus hijos ya formaron sus propias familias y su marido trabaja fuera, tiene una despensa y venta de minutas desde hace 21 años. Comenta que no quiere depender de nadie para su sustento por lo que con mucho sacrificio sobrelleva sus quehaceres domésticos y su negocio, también tiene una pequeña granja, cría gallinas y cerdos, se levanta antes de amanecer para poder cubrir todas sus labores. Su sueño es tener un mini mercado para ofrecer mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, con lo cual podrá abastecer su despensa y de esa forma tener en stock.
texts.en:
Domiciana, age 49, has been married to Milciades for 35 years.  They have three children, Milciades, Césaar, and Richar.  They live in their own house in the city of Coronel Oviedo.

Domiciana is a tenacious woman.  She was left alone because her children have formed their own families, and her husband works abroad.  She has had a  store and has been selling snacks for 21 years.  She says that she does not want to be dependent upon anyone to support her.  Therefore, with great sacrifice she carries out her household chores and her business.  

She also has a small farm.  She raises chickens and pigs.  She gets up before dawn in order to be able to cover all of her jobs. Her dream is to have a mini-mart in order to provide her customers with better service.

She is requesting to loan to buy drinks.  This way she will be able to supply her store and have drinks in stock.

loans.use: to buy drinks to stock her store.

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is 48 years old and lives in Sevan city. She is married and has three children. Her daughters are married and live separately from their parents, and Aida’s son lives in the same house with his parents. Aida’s husband is jobless, and her son is a correspondence student of Yerevan State University’s Gavar Branch. At the same time he works as a shop assistant (this allows him to pay for his education).  

Aida graduated from Yerevan Trade Technical School, where she earned qualifications as a food production engineer. She worked several years as a shop assistant at a jewelry shop. 

In 2008, Aida decided to organize her own business: she has rented a stall in a trading fair, where she sells souvenirs, jewelry, toys, kitchen utensils, etc. Once a month Aida buys merchandise from Yerevan. Her husband helps her in case of need. 

Thanks to her occupation, Aida supports her family. She received loans from Nor Horizon two times and now she is asking for a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy an assortment of souvenirs, toys, and jewelry to resell before the New Year’s holidays, as such merchandise is in good demand during that period of time.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of souvenirs, toys and jewelry to resell.

loans.name: Dahi

texts.en:
Dahi is a 56-year-old married man, the father of five children.

Dahi works in repairing cars' electronic issues. He's an expert in his field because of his long experience. He has been working in this domain for 42 years.

Dahi is a well known man, and he is a hard worker who made his own living to raise his five children.

Dahi works on improving his business. To do so, he applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy electric tools and hardware necessary for his business.

This is Dahi's fifth loan as an Al Majmoua borrower. His previous loan had a very positive impact, and he is a borrower in good standing.

Dahi is very optimistic about this loan, and he hopes it will help in making a better future for his family.

loans.use: To buy electric tools and hardware necessary for his business.

loans.name: Cosme

texts.es:
El Sr. Cosme es casado, tiene dos  hijos a su cargo. Trabaja Como Vendedor de Frutas, verduras y pollo en forma  Ambulante por la zona del Alto Paraná.
Con la ayuda de su esposa que con mucho sacrificio y dedicación están saliendo adelante ya que genera importantes ingresos para la familia.
El Señor ya es un microempresario exitoso con una clientela formada, debido a su amabilidad con sus clientes. Tiene un vehículo en el cual realiza la entrega de sus productos para la comercialización. Ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y honesta en sus obligaciones anteriores con la fundación.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad para poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Cosme is married and is raising two children. He works as a fruit, vegetable and chicken seller in the area of Alto Paraná.

With his wife's help and a lot of hard work and dedication, they are getting ahead, since he generated important income for the family. 

He is a successful micro-businessman with an established clientele, due to his friendliness with his customers. He has a vehicle that he does product deliveries with. He has shown himself to be a responsible and honet person with his prior obligations with the foundation.
   
He is asking for the loan to buy fruit and vegetables to stock up and have more variety to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables to later sell.

loans.name: Hamda

texts.en:
Hamda is a 44-year-old married woman and the mother of four children.

She works a full-time job at a hospital and after that she comes back to her own home business, which is a retail business selling mainly clothes.

She has applied for a loan so she can increase the quantity she has of clothes and add more goods other than clothes.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of clothes and other goods to sell.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
A married mother of a daughter who lives independently with her own family, 40-year-old Susanna lives in the city of Vanadzor where, for the past five years, she has managed her own business: food and household goods trading.

In her shop Susanna sells a large assortment of fresh and canned food and a wide variety of household goods, earning her a large customer base. She is frequently assisted by her husband, who works as a fire-fighter.

Susanna is now requesting a 250.000 AMD loan to buy pasta, cereals, candy and detergents for her shop.

loans.use: to buy pasta, cereals, candy and detergents for her shop.

loans.name: Suerkul

texts.ru: Суеркулу 60 лет. Основным источником дохода для семьи Суеркула является  животноводство. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Суеркула, начатое с суммы 25,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство, на сегодняшний день приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных  и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Суеркул обратился в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров. В планах Суеркула- вложить доходы в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Suerkul is 60 years old. The main source of income for his family is animal husbandry. Thanks to Suerkul's persistence and perseverance, the farm, which was started with a sum of 25,000 som (KGS), currently brings in around 15,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of meat and dairy products. 

In order to further increase the number of cattle, Suerkul turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of dairy cows. Suerkul plans to invest the income in further increasing the number of domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Radik

texts.en:
Radik is still going on with his business. He drives a taxi. This summer he will become a father, so he is very happy, and now he works with more diligence to provide his future baby with everything required.

Radik used his previous Kiva loan to buy new tire casings and to repair his car. But, as he drives a lot, his car’s tire casings have already worn out, and now Radik is asking for a 200,000-Armenian-dram loan to buy new tire casings and to repair the condition of his car.

loans.use: to buy new tire casings and to repair the condition of his car

loans.name: Hiram

texts.en:
Hiram is a 35-year-old businessman. He is married to Lucy, and they are blessed with three children, aged 17, 15, and 9 years. He has been running a retail shop for the past three years, earning a monthly income of KES 20,000, which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his fifth loan with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. Hiram will use the loan to buy stocks of sugar and rice for his shop. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and to open a wholesale shop, which will help him improve the living standard of his family.

loans.use: To buy stocks of sugar and rice for his shop

loans.name: Inshirah

texts.en:
After taking out her first loan to buy more products, Inshirah was able to sell and repay her loan earlier than was expected. 

Now she has applied for another loan to concentrate more on the clothing section and buy new models to cover most of the customers' tastes.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for resale.

loans.name: Qasem

texts.en:
Qasem is a 41-year-old single man who has two brothers and one sister. His oldest brother is already married.

Qasem works as a public transportation bus driver, where the bus is registered under his name.

Now he has applied for a loan to do some maintenance and renew the bus registration, and he hopes that in the near future he can have a new larger transportation bus.

loans.use: to do some maintenance and renew his bus registration.

loans.name: Seyran

texts.en:
Seyran is 38 years old. He and his family live in the village of Getahovit, in Tavush Region. Seyran’s family consists of his wife, two small children, his mother, and his sister. Seyran’s mother is a pensioner, his sister is jobless, and his wife is on maternity leave.
 
Since 2003 Seyran has worked as a rescuer, and he says he likes his work very much, though it is often very dangerous. To supplement this, Seyran and his family engage in animal breeding and land cultivation. With their combined efforts, they have breed two cows, two calves, and 20 chickens, and they grow fruit and vegetables and also fodder. 

The dairy products, eggs, fruit, and vegetables they produce are for the family's use, and now Seyran intends to develop his farming and to start to breed pigs as well. Therefore, he needs a 900,000-Armenian-dram loan to buy some pigs and calves for his farm and also to buy deficient fodder for his farm animals.   

This is Seyran’s third loan from Nor Horizon, and he always does his repayments in time.

loans.use: to buy some pigs and calves for his farm and also to buy deficient fodder for his farm animals

loans.name: Ozarjon

texts.ru: Озарчон житель города Куляб. Ему 23 года. Он разведен. У него двое детей. Озарчон имеет высшее экономическое образование. По профессии он не работает. Сейчас он занимается торговлей DVD и музыкальных дисков. Кредит берет для приобретения DVD дисков.
texts.en: Ozarjon is a resident in the city Kulob. He is 23 years old and divorced. He has two children. Ozarjon has a degree in economics, but does not work in this profession. Now he works with trade of DVDs and CDs. He takes a loan for the purchase of DVDs.

loans.use: to purchase DVDs

loans.name: Farukh

texts.ru: Фарух житель района Восеъ. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его брат милиционер. Сам Фарух занимается развозкой пассажиров по своему маршруту. В этой области он четыре года. Он берет кредит для ремонта своей автомашины.
texts.en:
Farukh is a resident of the region Vose. He is 25 years old and married. He has two children. His brother is a police officer. 

Farukh works with transporting passengers in his vehicle. He has been in this area for four years. He takes a loan for the repair of his vehicle.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Rasul

texts.ru: Расул житель района Фархор. Ему 44 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он занимается животноводством. Расул в основном откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Rasul is a resident of the region Farkhor. He is 44 years old and married. He has five children. He works with livestock. Rasul mainly fattens and sells cattle. He takes a loan for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Sanobar

texts.ru: Санобар проживает в районе Шахритус. Возраст, 41 год. Замужем. У нее четверо детей. Ее муж находится в Российской Федерации. Сама Санобар занимается торговлей мужской одежды. Этим видом деятельности занимается шесть лет. Кредит берет для увеличения товарооборота.
texts.en: Sanobar lives in the Shahritus area. She is 41 years old, married and has four children. Her husband is living in the Russian Federation. On her own, Sanobar is engaged in the trade of men's clothing. She has been engaged in this activity for six years. She is taking a loan in order to increase her inventory turnover.

loans.use: to increase her inventory

loans.name: Shodali

texts.ru: Шодали проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У них двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается животноводством. Кредит берет для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Shodali lives in Shahrituz District. He is 33 years old, married, and has two children with his wife. His wife is a homemaker. Shodali breeds cattle. He is taking out a loan for the purchase of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Urok

texts.ru: Урок житель района Шахритус. Возраст, 56 лет. Женат. Имеет четверых детей. Уже шесть лет как он занимается скотоводством. В основном он откармливает и продает скот. Кредит берет для закупа коровы.
texts.en: Urok is a resident of the Shahritus district. He is 56 years old, married and has four children. He has been engaged in raising cattle for six years. Basically he fattens and sells cattle. He is taking a loan to purchase a cow.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер житель Яванского района. Он женат. У него двое детей. Алишер разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет закупа бычков.
texts.en: Alisher is a resident of the Yavan district. He is married and has two children. Alisher breeds cattle for sale in the future. He has been engaged in this activity for four years. He is taking a loan for the purchase of bulls.

loans.use: to purchase bulls

loans.name: Abdukodir

texts.ru: Абдукодир зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается шесть лет. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Кредит берет для закупа несколько голов крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Abdukodir earns a living by breeding cattle. He has been involved in this kind of activity for six years. He is 49 years old, married and has three children. He is taking a loan to purchase a few heads of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en:
Mohamad is a 26-year-old single man who has worked as a barber since 2008. He is well known in his region and has a good reputation, which has helped him in making a lot of trustful friendships. This has also helped in improving his business, too. Mohamad has requested a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy tools, updated machines and cosmetics for his business, in addition to paying for his sick father's treatment. He has taken a loan before and was very pleased with the results.
Mohamad wants his shop to be filled and meeting every customer's need. He wants to expand his business to open a skincare department, which is highly requested by most of his customers these days.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools, updated machines and cosmetics for his business.

loans.name: Artsruni

texts.en:
Artsruni is 47 years old. He lives in Vardablur village, in the Lori area. He is married and has two sons: his elder son is studying at an institute in Russia, and his younger son is a pupil. Artsruni and his wife are teachers and they both work at a village school. As well as his work at school, Artsruni has run his own shop more than ten years. In his shop he sells food and household goods. He buys wares from providers. 
Artsruni says that his teacher’s salary is not enough to support his family, so his business allows him to provide his family with everything necessary. As trade before holidays is very active, Artsruni intends to increase his shop's assortment of goods. Therefore, he is asking for an 800,000 AMD loan to buy a large quantity of beverages, dairy foods, flour, sugar and various household goods for his shop.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of beverages, dairy foods, flour, sugar and various household goods for his shop.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 53 years old and married. He has been in the photography business for the past eight years and he is doing great. This is his fourth loan to expand his business since he was introduced to Kiva partner KADET. He plans to use the funds to buy additional films and batteries. 
John will use the anticipated profits to purchase more stock for his studio. In the future, he hopes to open several studio outlets.

loans.use: buy additional films and batteries.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 34-year-old married man and the father of one child. Salam opened his mobile selling shop four years ago. While his business is improving, competition is increasing, which is why Salam must stay in front of them, in a skilled and talented way.

With the help of Kiva partner Al Majmoua in the past, Salam was capable of facing most kinds of competition, because he bought most of his products in cash at very good prices and provided them to his customers at a price that they can't find lower in the market.

This time Salam is applying for a loan from Al Majmoua for the same reason: he will buy extra mobile prepaid cards and phone accessories with special prices to bring happiness for his customers especially during this holy season.

loans.use: To increase his stock of prepaid cards and phone accessories

loans.name: Santo Tomás Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre Santo Tomás, debido a que asi se llama la capilla del barrio de las miembros, han asumido el compromiso de  mantener unido el grupo y trabajar con respeto y responsabilidad. Actualmente se encuentran en el sexto ciclo con calificación excelente, integrada por  15 mujeres quienes invierten sus prestamos en sus respectivas actividades.
Ignacia es una de estas mujeres trabajadoras, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, y nos cuenta que gracias a estas ventas ella puede ayudar con los gastos del día a día de su hogar. Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora, luchadora y entusiasta, que no teme a los desafíos. Tiene como meta poder abrir un local grande donde poder ofrecer sus prendas.
Ella solicita la ayuda de kiva y fundación paraguaya para la compra de prendas de verano, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The committee is called Santo Tomás due to the fact that the member’s chapel in the neighborhood is also called Santo Tomás. They have taken on the commitment of maintaining a united group and working with respect and responsibility. Currently, the members are in their sixth cycle with excellent qualifications. The group is composed of 15 women who want to invest their loans in the respective activities. 
Ignacia is one of these hard-working women. She sells all types of garments. She tells us that thanks to these sales, she can help with the day-to-day expenses of her household. She is a fighter and a very hardworking, enthusiastic person who does not fear challenges. She has a goal of being able to open a large business where she can sell her garments. 
She is requesting help from Kiva and the Fundación Paraguaya to purchase summer clothing, so she can stock up and have more of a variety to offer to her customers.

loans.use: purchase summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. In 2005, she opened a small grocery store, which became a multi-function store because Sabah introduced goods in addition to traditional grocery store goods such as home products, like frames and pictures, and small gifts.
Sabah is a hardworking woman; she puts lots of effort into improving her business. With Kiva partner Al Majmoua's help, Sabah was able to invest three consecutive loans in improving it. At the same time, Sabah is a borrower in good standing. She is planning to expand her business further, and she might move to a larger place in the future.

loans.use: to purchase special food products and household appliances for her business.

loans.name: Githinji

texts.en:
Githinji is a 48-year-old clothes seller in Mshomoroni, Mombasa.  He is married and is a father of three children.  He has been doing this business for the past four years and he is doing great. 

He  was introduced to KADET and this marks his third borrowing to finance his business.  He plans to purchase more stocks of curtains, bed sheets and clothes to sell to the residents of Mshomoroni.  He will use the anticipated profits to buy additional stock. 

He hopes to open a big clothes shop.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of curtains, bed sheets and clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to do necessary maintenance to his van.

loans.name: Hernaldo José

texts.es:
El señor Hernaldo José,  reside  en  el departamento de Masaya. De oficio zapatero, casado y responsable de su hogar. Su negocio consiste en la elaboración de calzado de mujer, tiene la experiencia de 21 años dedicándose a esta labor, lo que le ha permitido adquirir una gran experiencia en dicho trabajo. 

El señor Hernaldo esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima como cuero, suela, pega, cuero nuevo, esponja, cerquillo, piel de cerdo, pega amarilla, pega blanca, fibra # 1.75, cajuela maría, cajuela juanita, cajuela Sofía, tela, entre otros.

Su núcleo familiar lo conforman dos hijos y su esposa, del cual uno de ellos es independiente. Considera que el crédito le ayudara en gran parte en aumentar sus ingresos y calidad de vida para su familia así como cubrir la demanda de todos y cada uno de sus clientes
texts.en:
Hernaldo José lives in Masaya Department.  He’s a cobbler by profession, married and responsible for his household.  His business consists in making women’s shoes.  He has 21 years’ experience in this work which has given him much experience in this line of work.

Hernaldo is asking for a loan to buy raw materials like leather, soles, glue, new leather, foam, shoe seams, pigskin, yellow glue, white glue, #1.75 thread, María, Juanita and Sofía –style forms and fabric, among others.

His nuclear family is composed of his two children and his wife; one of his children is independent.  He believes that the loan will help him in large part to increase income and his family’s quality of life as well as be able to meet each and every one of his customer’s demands.

loans.use: to buy shoe making supplies.

loans.name: George Ooko

texts.en:
George Ooko is a 35 year old tuk tuk operator in Kilifi. He is married and a father of two children. He has been doing this business for the past 6 years and is doing great. 

George was introduced to KADET and this marks his fourth borrowing to finance his business. He plans to purchase another tuk tuk and open a business for his wife. He will use the anticipated profit to educate his children and repay his loan. George hopes to have a prosperous business and a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase another tuk tuk and open a business for his wife.

loans.name: Julius Wagura

texts.en:
Julius Wagura is a 52 year old hotel owner in Kilifi. He is married and has been running this business for the last 3 years and is doing great. 

Julius was introduced to KADET and this marks his third borrowing to finance his business. He plans to renovate his hotel and purchase more dry foods like beans and maize to be served in his hotel. He will use the anticipated profit to expand his business and hopes to have a prosperous business and a happy family.

loans.use: to renovate his hotel and purchase more dry foods like beans and maize.

loans.name: Las Animas Group

texts.es:
Maria victoria cuenta con 27 años de edad, es casada su esposo se llama Noel Carlos es medico veterinario no tiene hijos, ella se dedica al comercio venta de huaraches y sandalias cuenta con local donde vende su mercancía ya tiene 1 año con el negocio el cual le va muy, e invertirá su préstamo en la compra de mas mercancía huaraches nuevos modelos ella espera que su préstamo le ayude ya que espera incrementar su negocio.

Maria victoria pertenece al grupo las animas el cual esta integrado por 10 personas las cuales son puras mujeres a continuación serán mencionadas: Leonarda, María, Gregoria, Evangelista, Marena, Petra, Ma de Jesús, Ma Victoria, Rafaela, Miriam, todas realizan una actividad comercial como son: venta de pescadería, frutas, verduras, pollos, cosméticos, florería, comida, etc.
texts.en:
María Victoria, 27, is married; her husband’s name is Noel Carlos.  He’s a veterinarian and they don’t have children.  She sells huaraches and sandals.  She has a stand where she sells her merchandise and has been in business for a year.  She does very well and will use her loan to buy more huaraches in new styles.  She hopes her loan will help her because she hopes to increase business.

María Victoria belongs to the “Las Animas” group which has ten members, all women, who are mentioned here: Leonarda, María, Gregoria, Evangelista, Marena, Petra, María de Jesús, María Victoria, Rafaela and Miriam.  They all carry out commercial activities like fish sales, fruit sales, vegetable sales, chicken sales, cosmetic sales, flower shop, food, etc.

loans.use: to buy huaraches.

loans.name: Dionardo

texts.es:
El Sr. Dinardo es de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, tiene 49 años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Toribia, tienen hijos, pero todos ya mayores de edad, que tienen su vida independiente hecha.
El se dedica a la construcción de obras hace aproximadamente 30 años. Gracias al buen trabajo que hace siempre es contratado por diversas personas, siempre se encuentra muy ocupado. Por medio de su trabajo el pudo sacar adelante a sus hijos y que sean lo que son hoy en día.
Solicita el crédito para materiales como ladrillos, cemento, cal, varillas y la adquisición de baldes para los trabajos a realizar. Agradece a la fundación y a Kiva por la ayuda que estas le están dando.
texts.en:
Dinardo is from the city of Mariano Roque Alonso; he’s 49 years old and married to Toribia.  They have children but they are all adults living independent lives.

He has worked in construction for about 30 years.  Thanks to the good work he does he’s always contracted by various people so he’s always busy.  Through is work he was able to raise his children to be what they’ve become today.

He’s asking for a loan for materials like bricks, cement, lime powder, rebar and buckets for upcoming jobs.  He thanks the Fundación and Kiva for the help they are providing him.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, lime powder, rebar, buckets and other items.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 57 años de edad, vive acompañado con la señora Rosa en un barrio muy concurrido de la ciudad de Itá, tienen un solo hijo el cual lo ayuda en su trabajo.
El señor José tiene un camión el cual utiliza para el transporte de ladrillos los cuales compra de la ciudad de Tobati y los vende en las ciudades de Asunción, Fernando de la Mora y alrededores a contratista de obras, arquitectos y a ocasionales clientes hace mas de 15 años, también  realiza flete de soja por el interior del país. El es un hombre muy trabajador y luchador, que toda su vida ha trabajado por darle lo mejor a su familia.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de unas cubiertas que necesita para realizar flete de soja. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
José, 57, lives with Rosa in a very crowded neighborhood in the city of Itá.  They have just one son who helps him with his work.  José owns a truck that he uses to transport bricks that he buys in the city of Tobati and sells in the cities of Asunción, Fernando de la Mora and neighboring areas to contractors, architects and occasional customers; he’s been in business more than 15 years.  He also transports soy beans into the interior of the country.

He’s a very hardworking, tenacious man who has worked his entire life to give his family the best.  He’s asking for the loan to buy some covers he needs to transport the soy bean loads.  He thanks the Fundación and Kiva for the opportunity he’s receiving.

loans.use: to buy tarp covers for his truck.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es:
Jesús, vive con su familia, sus padres, sus hijos y su esposa, solamente él trabaja en un negocio de reparación y venta de celulares, comenzó con el negocio por el apoyo de un amigo, del cual aprendió todo el manejo del negocio, no tiene un horario establecido y cuenta con clientes.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de repuestos, carcasas, cargadores, baterías para celulares, ya que se la han agotado y quiere realizar la compra para tener mejor capacidad.
La aspiración de Jesús es tener un mejor negocio, con más artículos, ganar más clientela y que su familia mantenga lo necesario.
texts.en:
Jesús lives with his family; his parents, his children, and his wife.  He works in a business selling and repairing cell phones.  He started the business with the support of a friend from whom he learned all about managing the business.  He does not have a fixed schedule, and he has customers.

He is currently requesting the loan to buy replacement parts, cases, chargers, and batteries for cell phones.  He has run out, and he wants to make the purchase to have more to sell.

Jesús' goal is to have a better business, to have more merchandise, to get more customers, and for his family to have what it needs.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts, cases, chargers, and batteries for cell phones.

loans.name: Abduaziz

texts.ru: Абдуазиз женат и имеет 3 детей. Сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2008 года. Кредит получает на расширения бизнеса. Его жена помогает бизнесу, когда он уезжает за товаром, она сидит за прилавком. Он занимается торговлей около 19 лет. Раньше торговал мужским бельем. Получив первый кредит увеличил свой товарооборот и добавил мужскую одежду. Со временем кроме мужской одежды он добавил и мужскую обувь. Раньше он торговал на улице , а недавно он переехал на новое место в контейнер. Настоящий кредит получил на приобретение зимней мужской одежды и обуви.
texts.en: Abduaziz is married and has three children.  He has been working with our organization since 2008.  He obtains loans for business expansion.  Abduaziz's wife helps him with the business and sits behind the counter, when he leaves to acquire merchandise.  He has been involved in retail sales for about 19 years.  He previously sold men's undergarments.  After receiving his first loan, he increased his goods turnover and expanded the selection to include men's clothing.  With time, he also added men's shoes to his merchandise selection.  Abduaziz previously sold on the street and recently moved to a new space in a container.  He requested this loan for the purchase of men's winter clothing and shoes.

loans.use: to purchase men's warm clothing and shoes

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel is 59 years old and lives in Vanadzor City with his wife and a daughter. 

Samvel works at a school as a watchman, his wife works at the same school as a teacher, and his daughter works at a disk shop as a shop assistant. 

Samvel says that their salaries aren’t enough for maintenance of the family, and that’s why he runs a clothes trading business as well. Samvel has engaged in business more than fifteen years. He rents a stall in the central market and sells women’s clothes, which he buys from Yerevan. Three or four times a month Samvel and other sellers from the same market rent a car and go to Yerevan's wholesale markets for buying goods to resell. 

In his business, Samvel emphasizes house suits and dressing gowns. 

This is Samvel’s third loan from Nor Horizon and now he is seeking an 800,000 AMD loan to buy a large lot of sweaters, trousers, and dressing gowns for his business.

loans.use: to buy a large lot of sweaters, trousers, and dressing gowns for his business.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en: Moses used the previous loan to buy soap, sugar and salt for resale and with the profits earned he was able to start a clothing business. He specializes in the sale of men's and lady's clothing and he hopes to reap enormous profits as the Christmas season is fast approaching. Moses needs the loan to buy clothes for sale as the demand is high.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale this Christmas season

loans.name: Sedrack

texts.en: Sedrack is a 39 year old married businessman living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He owns a retail shop where he also sells fresh food. He started with capital worth 200,000, but now it's worth 2,000,000. In spite of this, he faces the challenges of price fluctuation, inflation, high fuel and transportation costs. His dream is to educate his children and expand his business into a wholesale shop. Sedrack needs the loan to buy rice, sugar, salt and fresh food to sell.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, salt and fresh foods to sell

loans.name: Camino De Victoria 4 Group

texts.en:
Zenaida is the coordinator of her group, Camino de Victoria 4 (Road to Victory). She makes her home in a simple structure with her husband and two children. She says that her most difficult challenge was to have her own business. Now she is working to have her own house. In the meantime, she plans to continue to enjoy watching television.

Zenaida is excited to be taking her third loan. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying clothes, shoes, and cosmetics. She will use the profits for savings because the family needs to build a house and her husband's income only provides for basic expenses. Zenaida dreams of having her own home in a good structure, safe and beautiful, and thanks to her business and to Esperanza loans, she hopes that her dream will become reality.

This group is located in Santiago, in one of the slum zones where they are doing their business by walking and from their homes. These five members are dedicated to selling clothes, shoes, groceries, etc. They all thank you for your support.

loans.use: to buy miscellaneous products (cosmetics, clothes, shoes).

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 49 years old. She lives in Vanadzor City with her husband, daughter, and two small grandchildren. Mariam’s second daughter lives with her own family separately from her parents. 

For more than ten years Mariam has been running her own business: women’s clothes trading. She sells clothes at the central market where she rents a stall. Every week she goes to Yerevan, where she buys merchandise from wholesale markets for her business. Mariam’s husband helps with her business and thus they support their family, while their daughter stays at home and takes care of her children. 

This is Mariam’s third loan from Nor Horizon and she has never delayed her repayments. At this time she is asking for a 700,000 AMD loan to buy warm sweaters, jackets, and dresses to resell.

loans.use: to buy warm sweaters, jackets, and dresses to resell.

loans.name: Las Morenitas Group

texts.es: Las nuevas integrantes del grupo son la señora Leticia va a comprar con su prestamo cosméticos y perfumes la señora Lourdes va a comprar refrescos por caja y la señora Elena va a comprar refrescos, galletas, huevo, leche, frijol, azúcar, jabón, shampoo, etc. las demás integrantes siguen en la actividad que vienen desarrollando. La señora Elena tiene 56 años de edad, ella no sabe leer ni escribir, ella tiene 11 hijos 6 varones y 5 mujeres mayores de edad, ella tiene su tienda de abarrotes, ella solicito su préstamo para comprar aceite, jabón, frijol, azúcar, huevo, leche, refrescos, galletas, etc. ella inicio su negocio hace 6 años, ella sola aprendio echándole ganas a su tienda, su hijo de dio para comprar la mercancia y surtir la tienda, su negocio es importante porque le gusta vender y salir adelante, a ella le gusta atender a sus clientes amablemente, ella se siente orgullosa de su negocio que está en su casa y se siente independiente, ella está planeando surtir mas su negocio y lo piensa lograr con los prestamos. Sus sueños y esperanzas son tener mas grande su tienda para dar mejor servicio a sus clientes. las integrantes del grupo quieren decirle a Kiva y a Fundacion Realidad "les agradecemos sus prestamos, esperamos nos sigan ayudando con sus prestamos para crecer nuestros negocios.
texts.en:
The new member of the group are Leticia, who is going to use her loan to buy cosmetics and perfume, and Lourdes, who is going to buy cases of soft drinks, and Elena, who is going to buy soft drinks, cookies, eggs, milk, beans, sugar, soap, and shampoo, etc.The rest of the members continue in the activities they have been doing.

Elena is 56 years old. She doesn't know how to read or write and has 11 children, 6 sons and 5 daughters, all of them grown. She has her small grocery store and asked for her loan to buy oil, soap, beans, sugar, eggs, milk, soft drinks, cookies, etc. She started her business 6 years ago, ad learned just by putting all her enthusiasm into the store. Her son gave her the money to buy the merchandise and stock the store. Her business is important because she likes to sell and get ahead. She likes to serve her customers in a friendly way and is proud of her business. It is in her house and she feels independent. She is planning on stocking her business more and she plans on doing this with the loans. Her hopes and dreams are to have a bigger store to give her customers a better service. The members of the group want to tell Kiva and Fundacion Realidad "we thank you for your loans and we hope you will keep helping us with your loans to grow our businesses."

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, cookies, eggs, milk, beans, sugar, soap and shampoo

loans.name: Ixtlahuacan Group

texts.es: Este grupo solidario se llama Ixtlahuacan, está conformado por la señora Patricia va a comprar con su préstamo paletas, chicharrones, chocolates, yogurt y gelatinas, la señora María Clara va a comprar camas, colchones, sabanas, el señor Juan Carlos va a comprar una carcher, jabón, el señor Leonardo va a comprar fertilizantes para abonar su cultivo de caña. La señora María Clara tiene 56 años de edad, ella es divorciada, ella no tiene hijos, ella tiene su negocio de renta de jardín para eventos sociales y bungalós, ella inicio su negocio hace 3 años buscando información y sacándole provecho a su propiedad. Su negocio es importante porque de ahí tiene ingresos para comer y le permite salir adelante, ella se siente orgullosa de su negocio de ver que se están realizando sus sueños, ella recuerda cuando empezó le llamaron para rentar el jardín para un evento y se siente orgullosa que está dando frutos su trabajo, ella utiliza las ganancia para comprar plantas, lámparas, pinturas, focos y para pagar el agua y la luz. Sus sueños y esperanzas son crecer su negocio, construir el 2º. Piso y la alberca. Los integrantes del grupo le quieren decir a Kiva y a Fundación Realidad “Estamos agradecidos por sus préstamos, nos ayudan a continuar con los negocios”.
texts.en:
The Extlahuacan communal bank is comprised of the following members:

Patricia, who will use the loan to buy popsicles, “chicharrones” (fried pork rinds), chocolates, yogurt, and gelatin.

María Clara, who will buy beds, mattresses, and sheets.

Juan Carlos, who will buy soap and pressure washers.

Leonardo, who will buy fertilizer in order to fertilize his sugar cane crop.

María Clara, age 56, is divorced and has no children.  She has a business renting a garden and bungalows for social events.  She started her business three years ago when she was looking for information and took advantage of her property.  

Her business is important because that is where she gets the income to eat, and it lets her get ahead.  She is proud to see that her business is fulfilling her dreams.  She remembers when she started, and people called her to rent the garden for an event.  She feels proud that she is getting the fruit of her work.  She uses the income to buy plants, lamps, paint, lights, and to pay for water and electricity.

Her hopes and dreams are for her business to grow and to build a second floor and a pool.

The members of the group want to tell Kiva and the Fundación Realidad, “We are grateful for your loans, they help us continue our businesses.”

loans.use: to buy beds, mattresses, and sheets.

loans.name: Guillermo De Jesus

texts.es: Guillermo De Jesús es un emprendedor que creo con mucho esfuerzo su medio medio de vida que es su propio negocio que es una pulpería, el ya es cliente de Fundación León 2000 en cual se le ha brindado financiamientos para invertir en el negocio en la compra de variedad de productos. Guillermo ha cumplido uno de sus sueños que es de crear su propio negocio y verlo surtido con variedad de productos que ofrecerles a sus clientes que los visita que normalmente son vecinos de la zona donde vive. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para invertir en el negocio en la compra de golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, pan, detergentes entre otros productos que sus clientes llegan a solicitarle.
texts.en:
Guillermo De Jesús is an entrepreneur who, though a lot of hard work, created his way of life, which is his own small grocery store. He is already a client of the Fundacion Leon 2000, which has given him loans to invest in his business and purchase a variety of products. Guillermo has achieved one of his dreams, which was to start his own business and see it stocked with different products to offer his customers, who are generally from his neighborhood. 

Currently he is requesting a loan to buy snacks, sodas, basic grains, bread, detergents and other products that his customers ask him for.

loans.use: to buy snacks, sodas, grains, bread, detergent and other products.

loans.name: Sultana

texts.en:
Due to cultural issues, Sultana was unwilling to have her picture uploaded on the internet so the man in the photo is her son. Sultana is a 41-year-old married woman from Marka, Amman, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Sultana is selling clothes from her home and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase new clothes for her business. Sultana is looking to improve her business and open her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase new clothes for her business.

loans.name: Rami

texts.en:
Rami is a 21-year-old single guy who works in the public security department as a police officer.

His father Hamad has a shop selling fruits and vegetables, which the whole family is depending on as their source of income. The shop has been working for five years and now Rami wants to help his father expand his store and buy more fruits and vegetables so he has applied for a youth loan.

For security reasons, Rami requested that his father would appear in the photo instead of him.

loans.use: buy more fruits and vegetables  for his father's shop.

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en:
Dalal is 29 years old, married, and has five sons and daughters.

To help in supporting her family and assist her husband to raise their five children, she started a small retail business at home selling blankets and clothes. In the four years of running the business, Dalal has built a strong customer base and made good connections with different distributors.

Now she has applied for a youth loan to add new products that she could sell to her customers such as home products so she can have a new collection and variety in products.

loans.use: to add new products to what she sells.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 20 years old and a single man. He is the youngest among his brothers and sisters. 

A year ago he has started his own business by opening a mini-market in his neighborhood.

Now Mohammad has applied for a youth loan to buy more food products for the store so he can expand it later on.

loans.use: to buy more food products for the store.

loans.name: Milton Agenor

texts.es:
Milton de 42 años, es un hombre trabajador que desde niño comenzó a trabajar como albañil para ayudarle a su familia con los gastos personales. 

En la actualidad trabaja como vendedor de ropa ya que los ingresos que ha tenido le han ayudado a mejorar sus ingresos. Poco a poco quiere seguir creciendo económicamente por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar pantalones, blusas ropa para hombres y mujeres. 

En el futuro quiere que sus ventas se expandan y así tener dinero para comenzar a construir su casa.
texts.en:
Milton, 42 years old, is a hardworking man who began working as a mason as a child to help his family with their expenses.

Currently, he works as a clothing vendor since that revenue has helped him increase his income.  Little by little he wants to continue growing economically, so he is asking for this loan to purchase pants and shirts for men and women.  

In the future, he wants to expand his sales so that he can have money to begin to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, and shirts.

loans.name: Arles Agustin

texts.es: Arles Agustín tiene 64 años de esta, este emprendedor su actividad económica a la se dedica es a una librería que la emprende  con mucho esfuerzos y con los poco ahorros que tenia, el ya tiene años de experiencia en el negocio al que se dedica. Arles como característica del emprendedor de perseverar a los objetivos que se propone que es de tener su propio negocio y sobre todo ser independiente. Arlen Agustín está solicitando crédito para comprar capital trabajo para la librería como son los útiles escolares y adornos que son los que demandan sus clientes.
texts.en: Arles Agustín is 64 years old. This entrepreneur's business is a book store, which he started with a great deal of effort and with his small savings. He now has years of experience in this business. As a businessman, Arles is characterized by his perseverance towards achieving the goals he sets for himself, which are to have his own business and above all to be independent. Arlen Agustín is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for the book store, such as school supplies and decorations that are in demand among his customers.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and decorations

loans.name: Neil Tamaris

texts.es:
Doña Neil, sigue con su pulperia, con varios años, en su comercio, que junto con su esposo trabajan para el bienestar familiar, atraves que comenzo hacer los prestamo, logro crecer en inventario, dando mejores productos, vendiendo en mas cantidad, captando mas clientela.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo, podra comprar, granos basicos, carnes, pollo, productos lacteos, golosinas, producto de la coca cola, cereales, entre otros, que son lo mas consumibles. Ya que su objetivo, es seguir manteniendo el equilibrio de sus ventas como ganancias para poder, suplir sus gastos personales como sus compromiso de pago.
texts.en:
Neil continues with her grocery store after several years in business.  She works with her husband for the well-being of their family.  After starting to receive loans, they were able to increase their inventory, offer better products, sell in larger quantities, and have more customers.

Today, with this new loan, she will purchase basic grains, meats, chicken, dairy products, candy, Coca Cola products, cereals, and other items that are in demand.  Her goal is to continue maintaining a balance between her sales as income to be able to meet her personal expenses and her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase food products such as basic grains, meat, chicken, candy, cereal, and other products to increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es:
Feliciano de 30 años, comenzó en el negocio de frutas desde que su cuñado lo ayudo vendiendo legumbres. 

Poco a poco ha mejorado sus ingresos ya que trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 17h00pm todos los días vendiendo frutas. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo frutas para tener más variedad y que sus clientes se sientan más interesados.
texts.en: Feliciano, 30, began in the fruit business ever since his brother-in-law helped him selling vegetables.  Little by little he has improved his income because he works selling fruit from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. every day.  He has many goals with his business, which is why he wants to buy fruit with the loan, to have more variety and for his customers to be more interested.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Cristina Andrea

texts.es:
Cristina es una mujer trabajara que tiene muchas proyecciones de crecimiento ya que es vendedora de mercadería y de joyería. En la actualidad tiene ya clientes que le comprar la mercadería. 

Poco a poco ha incrementado el volumen de ventas por eso quiere seguir con el negocio de ventas de artesanía en joyas. 

Quiere seguir con sus ventas por eso quiere comprar con el préstamo artesanías en joyas y mercadería. En el futuro quiere establecer un negocio formal.
texts.en:
Cristina is a hard-working woman who has many projections for growth, since she sells merchandise and jewelry. At the present time she already has customers who buy her merchandise.

Little by little she has increased her sales volume, and for this reason she wants to continue with her business of selling hand-crafted jewelry.

She wants to continue with her sales, and so she wants to use the loan to buy handcrafted jewelry and merchandise. In the future she wants to establish a formal business.

loans.use: to buy hand-crafted jewelry.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a 19-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Alaa is requesting a youth loan of 500 JD to do home maintenance with an aspiration of improving her family's living conditions and increasing their living standards.

Due to cultural issues, Alaa doesn't want to have her picture uploaded on the internet so the man in the picture is her husband.

loans.use: to do home maintenance

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba is a 28-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of one child.

Heba is trading in clothes and she is requesting a youth loan of 400 JD  to purchase more quantities of clothes.

Heba is looking to open a shop for her clothes and purchasing her dream family house.

loans.use: To purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Reem

texts.en:
Reem is a 19-year-old single lady from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Reem has a home-based business through which she provides her family with a modest income to help them cover their needs.

Reem is selling clothes and she is requesting a youth loan of 400 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes.

Reem is looking to customize a room at her home for her sales purposes and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes.

loans.name: Nadia

texts.en:
Nadia is a 23-year-old married woman and a mother of one child.

Nadia is requesting a youth loan of 400 JOD to purchase new furniture for her home with an aspiration of purchasing a new house and improving her family's living income.

Due to cultural issues, Nadia was not willing to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is Nadia's husband.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture for her home.

loans.name: Zayed

texts.en:
Zayed is a 28-year-old man from Baqa'a, Amman, Jordan and he is a bridegroom. 

Zayed is requesting a youth loan of 1500 JD to finance part of his wedding expenses with an aspiration of purchasing his own house.

loans.use: to finance part of his wedding expenses.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es: Edilberto con su credikiva reacondiciono su carro donde vende café y compró 12 termos, su negocio se ve más elegante, se incrementaron las ventas pues tiene mayor cantidad de productos para la venta. Con su credikiva actual comprará en insumos y en refrescos para responder a la temporada de Carnaval que se avecina y en la cual planea lograr el exito de su inversión. Así mismo comprará mercancia para que su esposa venda tambien y generen mayores ingresos. Edilberto trabaja persistentemente porque tiene el sueño de adquirir su propia casa. Su mensaje a los financiadores es el siguiente: "Gracias a ustedes he podido mejorar mis condiciones de trabajo y espero contar con su ayuda en el futuro." "Me siento muy contento por los servicios recibidos y agradezco la oportunidad de generar nuevos ingresos para la familia. "
texts.en: Thanks to his previous loan, Edilberto has fixed the cart he uses to sell coffee and he bought 12 thermos; his activity has gained a more elegant look and his sales have increased because he has more products to sell. The loan he is currently requesting will be used to buy ingredients and drinks to meet the requests during the approaching Carnival season, when he plans on profiting from his investment. He will also buy some products for his wife to sell, in order to earn more money. Edilberto persistently works to fulfill his dream of buying a house of his own. This is message to the lenders: “Thanks to you I have been able to improve my working conditions, and I hope to keep on counting on you in the future. I am very happy about the services I have received and I am thankful for this new opportunity to earn more money for my family”.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and drinks for his activity and some other products that his wife will sell.

loans.name: Oscar Danilo

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre casado sin hijos, que vive con su esposa en Latacunga que es la capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi, ubicada a una hora y media de la ciudad de Quito. Es una acogedora ciudad, con estrechas calles adoquinadas, resaltadas por los vivos colores de las típicas fachadas de sus viviendas y el polvoriento paisaje circundante. Latacunga viene de dos voces quichuas llacata kunka que significa Dios de las Lagunas. Cuando llega noviembre sus empedradas calles se llenan de alegría por la celebración de la fiesta en honor a la Virgen de las Mercedes, se trata de la ceremonia de la “Mama Negra”, que simboliza la fertilidad y la productividad de la tierra.

El es taxista, oficio que lo aprendió de su padre. Nos cuenta que se casó a muy temprana edad y que su mayor sueño es poder terminar su carrera universitaria. Ahora su meta es poder sacar su licencia profesional y para ello necesita un crédito. Esto ya que en Ecuador el curso de "chofer profesional" y en sí, los documentos que solicitan resultan ser muy costosos y Oscar no los puede pagar en una sola vez. Con su licencia profesional espera poder trabajar a nivel interprovincial, teniendo así mayores ingresos. Sus clientes han demandado este servicio y Oscar al no tener esta licencia de manejo especial no los puede atender. Es su primer crédito y está muy optimista ya que con ello podrá ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Oscar is a married man without children who lives with his wife in Latacunga, the capital of the province of Cotopaxi, located an hour and a half from the city of Quito.  It is a friendly city with narrow cobbled streets highlighted by the vivid colors of the typical facades of their homes and the dusty surrounding landscape.  Latacunga comes from two Quechua words, "llacata" and "kunka," 'Dios de las Lagunas' [God of the Lagoons]. When November arrives, the paved streets fill with happiness for the celebration in honor of the Virgen de las Mercedes, or the ceremony of the Mama Negra, who symbolizes fertility and the productivity of the land.

He is a taxi driver, a job he learned from his father.  He tells us that he got married at a young age and that his biggest dream is to be able to finish college.  Now his goal is to get his professional license and for this he needs a loan because in Ecuador the "professional driver" course itself and the paperwork required happen to be very expensive, and Oscar is not able to pay for them all at once.  With his professional license he hopes to be able to work interprovincially, to have greater income.  His customers have asked for this service and Oscar is not able to take care of them without this special driver's license.

This is his first loan and he is very optimistic because with it he will be able to offer his customers better service.

loans.use: to pay for his professional driver's license.

loans.name: Paula Karina

texts.es:
Paula de 31 años, comenzó con unas pequeñas cosas en su pequeña tienda que estaba ubicada en la parte delantera de su casa. Poco a poco en un año a variado la mercadería que ha vendido y obteniendo mas clientela. 

Esta  comenzando a trabajar desde las 06h00 debido a la demanda de clientes que tiene en el sector hasta las 21h00 todos los días de la semana.  Quiere seguir con su negocio porque ha ayudado a sus hijos en sus estudios. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar enlatados, granos, carnes, bebidas etc.
texts.en:
Paula is 31 years old, she started her activity by selling small items in the small corner shop located at the back of her house. Little by little, in the space of one year, she has varied the products she was selling, thus gaining more customers.

She has started working form 6 am owing to her customers’ requests, and she works until 9 pm every day of the week. She wants to keep on running her activity because it has been a great help in paying for the education of her children. For this reason she is requesting a loan to buy canned food, basic grains, meat and drinks among other products.

loans.use: To buy canned food, basic grains, meat and drinks.

loans.name: Bertha Azucena

texts.es:
En la ciudadela La California de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Las Divinas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Bertha, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, la última de sus hijas aun vive con ella. Su marido es profesor.
 
Ella trabaja en el Municipio de Portoviejo y también se  dedica al comercio, vende  ropa de todo tipo y maquillajes, su forma de venta es bajo pedidos, trabaja en sus ventas los fines de semana  y por las  noches, también vende en su lugar de trabajo ya que sus mejores clientas son sus compañeras de trabajo, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días, su mercadería la compra en Guayaquil ciudad a la que viaja cada vez que necesita. Lleva más de 10 años dedicada a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar  ropa de todo tipo y maquillajes. Lleva tres años en el banco y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su meta es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Las Divinas" meets every 15 days in the La California neighborhood of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabi, known for many years as the "City of the Royal Tamarinds."  

Here we meet Bertha, who is 48 years old, married, and has 3 grown children.  Her youngest daughter still lives with her. Her husband is a teacher.

Bertha works for the municipality of Portoviejo, and also has a business selling all types of clothing and makeup.  She makes her sales by taking advanced orders.  She works on the weekends and also in the evenings.  She also sells in her place of work, because her best customers are her work colleagues.  Bertha sells on credit, and she collects every 15 days.  She buys her merchandise in Guayaquil, a city that she travels to whenever she needs products.  She has been doing this business for 10 years, and it is going very well.

This loan will be used to buy all types of clothing and makeup.  Berta has been with her communal bank for 3 years, and she likes it because of the help that she has been given through these loans.

Her goal is to have her own boutique.

loans.use: to buy clothing and makeup

loans.name: Amparo De Jesus

texts.es: A sus 57 años, la señora Amparo se dedica a la venta de productos cosméticos como lociones, cremas de mano y perfumes por catálogo, con esta actividad lleva 15 años trabajando todas las tardes y fines de semana recorriendo barrios de la ciudad de Medellín ofreciendo sus productos y consiguiendo nuevos clientes. Debido a sus percances de salud, la señora Amparo no trabaja desde hace un mes, actualmente se encuentra mejor de salud por lo que requiere de la compra de mercancía con la cual pueda reactivar su negocio y tener la oportunidad de cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén para no tener que desplazarse caminando por la ciudad.
texts.en: Amparo, 57, has been selling cosmetics such as lotions, hand creams and perfumes through a catalog for 15 years.  She works afternoons and weekends going around the different neighborhoods of Medellin, offering her products and getting new customers.  Because of a minor accident, Amparo hasn’t worked for a month but now she is better and needs to buy merchandise so that she can reactivate her business and fulfill her dream of having her own store so that she doesn’t have to keep walking through the city.

loans.use: to buy body creams and perfumes

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: Maria Esperanza  su negocio al que ejerce es a la venta de mercadería en general, es una emprendedora  que ha luchado por tener su propio negocio, sus metas es ahora de tener bien surtido su negocio de variedad de mercadería, no es su primer crédito, el anterior lo ocupo para invertir  en el negocio en la compra de mercedaria que le estaban solicitando sus clientes. Maria Esperanza está solicitando financiamiento para comprar mercadería ropa, zapatos, camisas, ropa para niños, cosméticos entre otros productos.
texts.en: Maria Esperanza sells general merchandise. She is an entrepreneur who has striven to run her own activity, and her current goal is to keep her store well-supplied with a variety of products. This is not her first loan: she invested the previous one in the purchase of products for her shop according to her customers’ requests. Maria Esperanza is now requesting a loan to buy products such as clothes, shoes, shirts, children's clothes and cosmetics among other products.

loans.use: To buy clothes, shoes, shirts, children's clothes and cosmetics among other products.

loans.name: Shirley Victoria

texts.es:
Shirley de 42 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda.

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora ella trabaja en su tienda vendiendo víveres variados y papelería.  

Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda. Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como bebidas, juguetes, perfumes, cremas, confites etc.
texts.en:
Shirley is 42 years old, and she is a hardworking woman with a great ambition to see her small shop grow in the coming years.

She started her activity by selling small things and little by little she started making money. She now works in her shop where she sells different items of food and stationery.

She has many goals and for this reason she wants to keep on running her shop. She is consequently asking for a loan to buy products for her shop such as drinks, toys, perfumes, creams and jams among other products.

loans.use: To buy drinks, toys, perfumes, creams and jams.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Doña Gloria, continua con su negocio en electrodomestico, casi el ochenta por cierto en encargos, su esposo comercializa tambien electrodomestico, logrando mejores ingresos para el sustento de la familia.
Con los financiamiento ha venido comprando, mas productos, gracias a esto ha logrado captar mas clientela, generandole mejor disponibilidad de ganancias.
Con su prestamo comprara: tres planchas, tres cocinas de mesas electricas, dos grabadoras, dos arroceras, tres dvd premier, dos licuadoras, tres maquinas de coser y tres bicicletas pequeñas, casi todos son solo para entregar mercaderia, el cual trabaja con creditos y al contado, comprando al mayor, le dan a mejor precios, dando a precios accesibles a sus clientes tambien.
texts.en:
Gloria still has her electrical appliance business, almost 80% of which is through orders. Her husband also sells electrical appliances, earning additional income for supporting the family. With the loans, they have been buying more products, and thanks to this have managed to gain more customers, and generate more earnings. 

With her loan, she will buy three irons, two electric hotplates, two tape recorders, two rice cookers, three Premier DVD players, two blenders, three sewing machines, and three small bicycles. 

Almost all this merchandise is for delivery.  For this she takes cash, and extends credit. She buys at wholesale, so they give her better prices, and she also sells to her customers at affordable prices.

loans.use: To buy electrical appliances to continue building up her business and filling customer orders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics, earrings, chains and rings to sell.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 40-year-old widow from Irbid, Jordan.

Abeer has her own beauty salon and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to expand the salon by purchasing some equipment. Abeer is looking to add a skin treatment section to her salon and purchasing a car.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cosmetics products and accessories for trading purposes

loans.name: Beneranda Poderosa

texts.es:
En la ciudadela La California de  Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Las Divinas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Beneranda, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos dos mayores de edad y la menor de 17 años, todos sus hijos aun viven en su casa, las dos menores estudian en universidad y colegio. Su esposo  trabaja en Jipijapa en un centro de estudios.

Ella es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a sus hijas en sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y de productos de Avon y Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los  días de  dos a tres horas diarias, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene más de 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.
 	
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa de todo tipo. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. 

Su sueño es ver que sus hijas sean profesionales.
texts.en:
The city La California de Portoviejo, capital of Manabí, has been known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind Trees. The members of the communal bank Las Divinas meet every fifteen days. 

Here we find Beneranda. She is 55 years old and married, and she has 3 children, two who are grown and one minor who’s 17 years old. All of her children live in her home; the two youngest study in college and university. Her husband works in Jipijapa in a study center. 

She is a housewife who, in order to have her own resources and be able to help her children in their studies, sells a variety of types of clothes as well as Avon and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories). She works every day for 2 to 3 hours. She sells her products on credit and collects every 8 days. She has been doing this for more than 6 years, and it’s going very well. 

This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and various sorts of clothes. This is the loan cycle in the communal bank, and she likes it because the payments are easy to make.  	

Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothes.

loans.name: Abdul Razak

texts.en:
This is 37-year-old Abdul.  He is married and has two children aged 8 (class 5) and 4. He has no additional dependents. 

In 2002, Abdul established his computer accessories business. He began his business after he obtained a diploma in Computer Studies but could not secure a job. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, he earns about Le 2,000,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000 to buy computer accessories which are in high demand in offices around his shop. This will increase his turnover and his profit. 

His greatest challenge is that computer items are imported which means you should have foreign currency which is not easily accessible. He intends to further his education in computer studies and to educate his children to university level. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy computer accessories.

loans.name: Miriam Maria

texts.es:
Miriam es una persona que es conocida en su sector por ser muy trabajadora y dispuesta a salir adelante. Desde hace aproximadamente 29 años empezó con un pequeño negocio donde vendía recipientes desechables, y poco a poco este negocio ha ido creciendo y ha ido diversificando los productos que ofrece a sus clientes. Miriam afirma que ella aspira a tener un negocio muy grande, donde todas las personas lo tengan como referente y este negocio le genere grandes ingresos. Por el momento el negocio tiene unas ventas muy inconstantes, por lo que Miriam debe alternar la venta de recipientes desechables con la venta de helados. La gran ventaja es que Miriam desempeña esta actividad desde su casa y puede estar al tanto del cuidado de su familia. 
Con el ánimo de afrontar una temporada en la que Miriam manifiesta que sus ventas se incrementan considerablemente, Miriam requiere surtir su negocio y comprar más mercancía de productos desechables, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para hacerlo, por lo que Miriam aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de la mercancía de recipientes desechables y pueda estar preparada para la temporada donde sus ventas se incrementan notablemente.
Miriam aspira a que cuando sus ingresos se incrementen, estos le permitan mejorarles la calidad de vida a las personas de su familia.
texts.en:
Miriam is a person known in her neighborhood for being very hardworking and willing to get ahead.  Approximately 29 years ago she began with a small business where she was selling disposable containers.  Little by little this business has grown and she has diversified the products she offers to her customers.

Miriam affirms that she is aspiring to have a very big business in which everyone has her as a reference, and this business will generate a large income for her.  For the time being the business has unstable sales, so Miriam has to alternate selling disposable containers with selling ice cream.  The big advantage is that Miriam does this job from home and can be on top on taking care of her family.

With the intention of facing a season in which Miriam says her sales go up considerably, Miriam needs to supply her business and buy more merchandise of disposable products.  However, currently she does not have sufficient capital to do it.  This is why Miriam is striving for a loan, to give her the possibility of managing to buy the disposable containers so she can be prepared for the season in which her sales go up notably.

Miriam hopes that when her income goes up she will be able to improve the quality of life of the people in her family.

loans.use: to buy plastic containers for the season in which her sales increase.

loans.name: Arlett Del Socorro

texts.es: Muy pronto se realizarán la fiesta del Carnaval de Barranquilla y todos en la ciudad se preparan para divertirse como cada uno quiera.  Los empresarios  surten sus negocios,  para responderle a sus clientes, con bebidas, comidas, artesanías, disfraces, carrosas y verbenas, en torno a la popularidad que emana de los ciudadanos de la ciudad y de turistas locales e internacionales; como un solo bloque estas fiestas del caribe colombiano llenas de color  y de acción logran que la gente  se aliste para deleitarse y desinhibirse  disfrazándose,  comprando y bailando. Esto es justamente lo que aprovechan los emprendedores como Arlett, que con su negocio de  venta de refrescos y bebidas frías, planea tener un buen surtido para que sus utilidades en esta temporada se incrementen, aprovechando el derroche de alegría de sus clientes. Su negocio nació justamente del carnaval de Barranquilla, cuando en el año 1989, vendía todos los productos de la empresa Bavaria,  en todos los eventos del Carnaval dela ciudad y en las fiestas de los municipios de los departamentos, para ello no necesitaba de capital de trabajo, pues los productos se los entregaban mediante el sistema de consignación, es decir los que no vendía podía devolverlos. Aquí aprendió a trabajar independientemente y poco a poco con su trabajo y sus ahorros,  logró comprar cervezas, gaseosas y poni maltas por cajas,  que vendía al detal; gradualmente con el incremento de su capital de trabajo,  logró comprar en mayor cantidad y así mismo vender al  mayor. En la actualidad nuevamente se prepara para responder a esas  festividades   y debe estar muy bien dotada de todo lo que la alegría de sus clientes le exige. Esta es la razón  por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cervezas en mayor volumen, para venderlas en las diferentes festividades  y desde su propia vivienda contagiando a quien la conoce de mucha alegria.
texts.en:
Soon they will celebrate Carnival in Barranquilla, and all the people in the city are preparing to enjoy themselves, each in his or her own way. The merchants are stocking their businesses, so that they can respond to their customers' requests with beverages, foods, handicrafts, costumes, parade floats and fairs, because of the popularity of the festival with the citizens of the city and the local and international tourists. As a single block, these festivals of the Colombian Caribbean, full of color and action, enlist the people to enjoy themselves and lose their inhibitions, wearing costumes, buying, and dancing. 

This, as it happens, is what the business people like Arlett take advantage of, with her business of soft drinks and cold beverages. She plans to have a good stock so that her profits increase during this season, taking advantage of the extravagance of happiness of her customers. As it happens, her business was born out of the Barranquilla Carnival, when, in the year 1989, she was selling all the products of the Bavaria company at all the Carnival events in the city and in the township festivals in the districts. To do this, she didn't need any working capital, since they gave her the products on the consignment system, that is, she could return what she didn't sell. There she leaned to work independently, and little by little, with her work and her savings, she managed to buy beer, soft drinks, and Pony Malt (a non-alcoholic malt beverage) by the case, which she sold retail. Gradually, with the increase in her working capital, she managed to buy in larger quantities and also to sell wholesale. Now she is preparing again to respond to these festivities and she should be very well stocked with everything that the happiness of her customers requires of her.
